  • Heavy cell chargers now flash while they charge. Ported from Polaris.

15 May 2020

Alberyk updated:

  • Restricted the synthetic hair extensions to species that have hair.

Geeves updated:

  • Doing enough fire damage to a corpse will now turn it into a skeleton.
  • Added a personal shield device to the traitor tools uplink.
  • Added a radiant shielding aura spell to Battlemage and Cleric.
  • Added an exosuit shield drone to the mechfab.
  • == ADMIN FACING CHANGES ==
  • Adds full variants of stacks of items in the spawn menu.
  • Adds local narrate, which allows you to narrate to all mobs in a your view or your view range tile radius.
  • Allows admins to reset stationbounds via right click or Special Verbs menu.
  • Adds a random type golem rune to the spawn menu, if an admin wants to adminbus a random golem into a round.
  • Spawned borers now get added to the Ghostspawner menu, allowing players to inhabit them even if they didn't catch the original request.
  • Borers have gained the ability to survey their host's health, allowing them to better choose when to administer certain chemicals.
  • Borers now regenerate chemicals even if their host is unconscious.
  • Awakening psionics now take 15 seconds instead of 10, and the host now gets a message about feeling something bad coming on, allowing them to make a dash to safety and or seclusion.
  • Skrell returning from Srom no longer eject controlling borers to the lobby by replacing their ckey into the aether.
  • Skrell no longer spontaneously die when entering Srom on a map that doesn't have a Srom location.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Actually reduces nymph health to 33.3.

Teh Flamin'Taco updated:

  • Set-Ambition should no-longer be filled with HTML constructs when edited.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Fixes request consoles having weird lighting.

Alberyk updated:

  • Non-slip species flag should no longer grant immunity to lack of gravity effects.
  • Fixed Zavodskoi Interstellar contractors being able to be Physician, they should now have access to the surgeon role.

Arrow768 updated:

  • The staffwho function now shows if a staff member is AFK.

Geeves updated:

  • Fixes internals appearing to be off, even when they're on, when spawning or relogging.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • IPCs can now be Zavodskoi contractors, except for liaisons. Do not join as an IPC liaison, or your IPC/head whitelists will be stripped.

13 May 2020

Alberyk updated:

  • Renamed Necropolis Industries to Zavodskoi Interstellar.
  • Idris contractors can no be longer be cargo technician and quartermaster.
  • Zavodskoi/Necropolis contractors can no be longer be pharmacist and warden.
  • Hephaestus Industries can no be longer be cargo technician, scientist and quartermaster.
  • Fruits with the teleporting gene do not randomly teleport people anymore. They will now create a portal where they land.

  • Changes the CCIA Recorder to prompt if there were antags involved in the Incident.

09 May 2020

Arrow768 updated:

  • Incompatible applications are no longer downloaded via the presets.
  • Reduced/Adapted the size of various applications.
  • The investigations / generic wristbounds are now enrolled aswell.

Geeves updated:

  • Ghosts with ghostears can now see IRC communications properly.

08 May 2020

Alberyk updated:

  • Removed the multitool option from the augment combitool.

Code by Geeves, Sprites by Scrambles updated:

  • IPC tags have been completely changed, in appearance and function.
  • IPC tags now store a serial number, ownership status, and citizenship data, all of which is editable by the player in character creation.
  • Cyborg analyzers no longer pick up IPC tags, unless the IPC's head is open.
  • You can no longer examine an IPC to see if they have an installed tag.
  • You can edit a tag's info as an in-game character by using a multitool on it. Doing so without permission is highly illegal.
  • You can take the tag out of an IPC tag implanter by using a screwdriver on it.

Karolis2011 updated:

  • Added integrated computing device to pAIs.
  • Ported all relevant pAI programs to VueUI and integrated computers.
  • As pAIs software system is now reliant on modular computers, pAIs might be more capable than before.
  • pAI card icon selection is now available trough verb instead of software interface.
  • Integrated computing devices has been restructured to allow restrictions depending silicon type.
  • Adds ability to download suit sensor program to stationbounds.
  • Adds service abilities to modular computers. Services are like toggles for programs.
  • NTNet Software Download Tool got ported to VueUI. Also it received ability to have download queue.
  • NTNet Relay Chat Client got ability to have direct message channels.
  • NTNet Relay Chat Client got ability to join multiple channels at once.
  • NTNet Relay Chat Client no longer allows duplicate nicknames.
  • Crew manifest program was added.
  • Fixes cargo control program being broken.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Ghosts can now see visible messages such as surgery messages. This is affected by the ghostsight preference.
  • Damage from ZAS fires should work properly now.
  • Ghosts should no longer get double the visible messages.

Skull132 updated:

  • Fixed recorders and pAIs and other things not hearing anything while being held in hands. (Bug only affected the server if it was using BYOND > 513.1512.)

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • New wall terminal sprites, i.e, newscaster, request console, ringer, production console, etc.
  • Newscasters print to your hands instead of down to the floor.

04 May 2020

Geeves updated:

  • Some of the wall fixtures now glow in the dark, as they have bright cyan screens.
  • ATMs now gain an overlay when a card is inserted. It's minute, so you'll probably still forget your ID, like you always do.
  • Canisters now properly emit the light their icons portray them having.
  • Canisters now eject tanks into any of your hands, dropping them to your feet if your hands aren't free.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Antag emp grenades and artifacts have been halved in range.
  • Chem EMP grenades have been massively scaled back in range.
  • Radium no longer gives dionae extra healing.
  • Radiation no longer gives Dionae M'sai tier speed.
  • Diona now have a lower grab mod and resist mod, making it easier to grapple them.

  • The Discord button works again.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Adds NTSL Interpreter to all modular computers.
  • 128 GQ standard hard drives can now fit in wristbound computers/tablets. Go ask Research for one.
  • Games and the news browser are much smaller now.

28 April 2020

Geeves updated:

  • Examining someone with a modular computer on their ID or gloves slot will now show the ID info if there's one inside.
  • Security and medical HUDs now get the proper person info if the person has the ID in their modular computer.
  • Things that check your ID will now primarily use the ID in your slot, rather than the one in your hands.
  • Tape recorders now come with a portable drive, that when ejected, saves the stored transcript in a digital form.
  • Tape recorders now only audibly play back in a 3 tile radius, no more room spam.

House_Of_Synth updated:

  • Adds a verb for custodian borgs in the robot commands tab that allows the player to toggle passive cleaning tiles they walk over.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Ghosts now only see bolded emotes when they're near the emoter.

chada updated:

  • Just adjusted the 'borg sprite order and added Sci sprite duplicates of some jani 'borgs for consistency in the sprite use.
  • Just converted all of the 'lighting_layer +'s to 'above_lighting_layer's

Alberyk updated:

  • Hulks should be immune to pain now.
  • Removed the hulk green overlay.
  • Breaking mineral walls now a chance of creating a cloud of dust.

  • Replaced the mateba sprite, name and description.

Geeves updated:

  • Floating messages now has regular brightness in darkness and properly display over most items.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Armor can once again fully block damage.
  • Republicons no longer bleed.

Skull132 updated:

  • Medium severity crimes can no longer be fined for.

chada updated:

  • Replaced the 'Revolutionaries' with 'The Contenders', a more neutral term that will hopefully make it easier for them to recruit in the Crew.
  • Replaced the 'Loyalists' with 'The Fellowship', which should leave them as the more friendly sounding of the two yet still be much less pro-Command.
  • Added two brand new hud icons with these differences in mind. Made better ones afterall and had to change this entry.
  • Gave the Contenders and Fellowship both their own uplinks and TC, and I removed the Old Loyalist ability to recruit mindshielded persons and them starting with a Head. This should lead to a more even round.

  • Fixes the eldritch blade having no sprites

  • Ghosts can now jump to emotes.

  • Now only the F in the follow link is a link, to make it easier on the eyes.

Geeves updated:

  • Wristbound clicking is now more consistant when it's in the ID slot.

Geeves updated:

22 April 2020

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed pAI creating a ghost card when folded.
  • Fixed the tajaran candy not replacing the reagents after being cooked.
  • Fixed a a medical borg icon facing the wrong direction.
  • Fixed not being able to remove wrist computers by dragging them to a hand slot.
  • Fixed magboots eating shoes.

Alberyk, Happy_Fox updated:

  • Added a some new options to the custom loadout: bunny slippers, pyjamas and colorable plastic clogs.

Geeves updated:

  • Machine blueprints now no longer need multitools to finalize their direction, you only need to click it with an empty hand.
  • Machine blueprints have received revamped examines, allowing you to see what the next assembly and disassembly step is, as well as what it'll become.
  • Modular computers have gotten a major clean-up. Many programs and interactions should look prettier and feel smoother now.
  • Click dragging most modular computers now open their interface, much like with PDAs.
  • The IRC program now outputs messages to your chat log, much like PDA messaging does. For smaller devices, it must be on your person, whilst larger ones have a radius to it. The IRC program must be open, it doesn't have to be active, for it to work.
  • The size of the antag hacked camera program has been brought way down, to make it worth getting, if you wish to do so.
  • Added some new names to the modular computer arcade game.
  • Suit sensors can now be run on most regular modular computers, no big change in that department.
  • Computers now ping when they finish downloading programs, letting you know without needing to check them.
  • Backup data crystals now have nicer names.
  • Examining a modular computer now shows you its components.

21 April 2020

Chada-1 updated:

  • Added a new animation for the module and sprite selection process, it's a repurpose of the telepad spark animation.
  • Lowered the sprite selection tries to 6 from 11, 11 is overkill.

Code by Geeves, Sprites by Aticius & Europa Devs updated:

  • Tweaked access checking to check for IDs within your gloves slot.
  • Tech Support now spawns with a wristbound computer.
  • Created a new loadout section just for modular computers.
  • If you have your modular computer, be it a laptop, tablet, or wristbound, in your active hand, ID, or glove slot, it will now allow you use it to access things like airlocks and computer programs.
  • Modular tablets now fit in the ID slot.
  • Wristbound computers fit in the ID and Gloves slot.
  • Fixed security having access to the investigation department's programs.

Geeves updated:

  • Areas with lightswitches now start with them off, unless someone spawned in at them during round start.
  • Ash and snow now cause footprints when you walk across them.
  • Tweaked the robustness of the examine code when your appendages and clothes are covered in fluids like blood, it now somewhat accurately displays what they're stained with.

20 April 2020

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed the pioneer scarf not being colorable.

Code by Geeves, Sprites by Happy Fox updated:

  • Added a special power cell backpack to the mining vendor and RnD protolathe design databank. Give it a try, if you work with power cells a lot.

Geeves updated:

  • Station Blueprints now count asteroid turf as space, this should reduce server crashing when using them.
  • Air alarms and APCs now self-destruct when they detect their area as being within a mine or space area.

chada1 updated:

  • Moved the help/harm overlays for 'borgs back to add_overlay.
  • Fixed a bug that caused ss_overlays to blank the 'borg eyes if they had another overlay added to them.

19 April 2020

Alberyk updated:

  • Some cultural and religious items in the custom loadout can't be renamed anymore.
  • Removed the deadly stuff from the vent clog event, replaced some of them with more interesting choices.

Chada updated:

  • Fixed the Off-brand MAD icon_state name in the robots.dmi to line up to the module sprite name..

DanseMacabre updated:

  • The detective's sidearm has been reworked: It is now a 9mm pistol loading flash ammo by default. You can also rename it, like you could with the revolver.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Mesons, NVGs, science goggles and such all have scanline effects now.
  • Brain health will now decay faster in lower oxygenation levels.
  • Brute damage now inflicts slightly more pain.
  • Tweaked organ spillover damage code. This will probably have some effects on how damage is calculated, as the old one was not updated.
  • Brain scarring can now happen while below 60% blood oxygenation.
  • Scarring can now go up to reducing an organ's maximum health by 50%.
  • Blue grabs no longer make the grabbed person drop their held things.
  • Choking people now starts a timer, at the end of which the afflicted person will go unconscious.
  • Fixed hearts displaying a positive pulse after the person is dead.
  • Fixed pointblank messages not displaying.

SpaceBaa updated:

  • Remains now crumble when touched by robots, or pulled by anyone.
  • Robot remains now degrade into a pool of oil instead of nothing.

18 April 2020

Geeves updated:

  • You can now remove individual items from a tray by having it in one hand, and clicking it with the other empty hand.
  • The sprites on trays are now randomly spread out instead of just going into the centre.
  • Service borgs no longer teleport items using the force when operating the tray.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Fixed gun fire message wonkiness.

SpaceBaa updated:

  • Mine drones and other bots no longer bleed when shot.

17 April 2020

Alberyk updated:

  • Removed station engineer alt titles.

Goret updated:

  • Fixed two intercoms being next to each other in the captain's office.
  • Bullets are now faster.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Ports a change to the recoil animation from Nebula.

16 April 2020

Chada-1 updated:

  • Made 'borgo eyes able to glow in the dark via a new _layers definition.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Synaptizine, methylphenidate, risperidone and olanzapine will reduce overall hallucination duration, reduce frequency of hallucination effects, and sometimes prevent them entirely. Useful!
  • Some hallucinogenic drugs and toxins will now increase the duration you hallucinate and make effects happen more frequently.
  • Wulumunusha will now cause skrell to experience light hallucinations (as its description implies) at dosages greater than 10u.
  • Fixed null hallucinations causing runtimes. Hopefully.

Geeves updated:

  • Elevator doors are now opaque and laser shots will not pass through them.

House_Of_Synth updated:

  • The leather jacket in the loadout now has pockets.

SpaceBaa updated:

  • Fixed an issue where drones could not open windoors by walking into them.
  • Fixed a bug where Maintenance Drones could not pull pipe meters.
  • Fixed a bug where the sprite for Maintenance Drone screwdrivers was blank.

14 April 2020

Alberyk updated:

  • The emergency shuttle can only be called after one hour into the round. This can be changed on the config file.

Geeves updated:

  • Fixed slime core batteries from charging over their maxcharge cap.
  • Increased the slime core battery maxcharge cap from 10K to 15K. Added an informational description to the core.

Goret updated:

  • Crystal artifacts don't show a missing sprite anymore.
  • Thetamycin now metabolise at 0.01u per tick, as it used to be.

MattAtlas updated:

  • The launch CCIA shuttle verb actually works now.

12 April 2020

Geeves updated:

  • Fixed null emergency shuttles causing runtime errors when the game checks for status displays.

11 April 2020

Ferner updated:

  • Fixed the transfer shuttle sending an announcement twice. Fixed the research shuttle not triggering away site ghost spawners. Fixed ert/tcfl shuttles not triggering blastdoors containing their areas.

Furrycactus updated:

  • Fixed the double layered hydro trays in maintenance.
  • Fixed the freezer room for medical's cryo cells.
  • Fixed the mislabeling of the Atmos voidsuits as hardsuits.
  • Added a filing cabinet to the Library desk.
  • Added a cell charger to the Xenoarchaeology Atrium.
  • Added a filing cabinet to the Detective's Office.

Goret updated:

  • Added two new hairstyles: Undercut 5 and Swept, Back. Credit to Lauren for the sprites.
  • Modified the hairstyles: bob curl 2, unkept and business 1 to 4.

House_Of_Synth updated:

  • Salt shakers, pepper mills and space spices can now be shaken but will emit no noise when empty.
  • Added a shaking sound for when salt shakers, pepper mills and space spices are shaken.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Adds inhands for some welders, drills, and combitools.

10 April 2020

Geeves updated:

  • You now harmlessly kick Schlorrgo on harm intent.

09 April 2020

FearTheBlackout updated:

  • Adds a Coalition of Colonies flag and banner to the loadout.
  • Adds sprites for the Coalition of Colonies flags, courtesy of Kyres.

Ferner updated:

  • Fixes the research shuttle not leaving the proper turfs behind.

Furrycactus updated:

  • Added another round of contractor clothing. A labcoat for Necropolis medical/research workers, a labcoat for Hephaestus research workers, and a beret for Hephaestus workers.

Geeves updated:

  • Mech cargo clamps can now hold up to five items, instead of just one. Alt click to put down something specific, Crtl click to put down the first item in the list of carried stuff.
  • Clamps no longer go into storage bags when clicking on them.

08 April 2020

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • New/unset explosive implants are no longer triggered by literally any word. The default phrase is also harder to just randomly say.

Geeves updated:

  • Mining drills now store their error messages, allowing you to examine it when adjacent and read them.
  • Mining drills now report when their resource fields are depleted.
  • It now takes a while to take the mining satchel out of mining drills, to prevent accidental removal.
  • Mining drills now use much less charge while working.
  • Mining drills now gather resources from a two tile radius around it. It will only make a hole under the drill, however, so keep that in mind.
  • Any ore inside the mining drill will be beamed to a connected crate when a bluespace ore satchel is attached.
  • Braces will now automatically face their mining drill when attaching or removing them with a wrench. No need to alt click them many times.
  • Upped the gold and silver ore's rate of spawning in asteroid turfs.
  • Fixed Hephaestus Drill Technicians getting the wrong equipment.

House_Of_Synth updated:

  • Changed the functionality of the borg sheet holder module. It will now hold sheets and tiles.

ReadThisNamePlz updated:

  • Makes Grates cost only one metal rod, and it gives back one metal rod when deconstructed.

07 April 2020

Geeves updated:

  • Dragging a PDA onto itself no longer opens its menu. Over PDA dragging actions still function as normal.
  • Dragging an item onto itself, or onto the slot it's equipped to, doesn't drop it to the floor anymore.

PoZe updated:

  • Kinnetic accelerator no longer creates phantom projectile on turf of user.

06 April 2020

Furrycactus updated:

  • Fixed the white Zeng-Hu beret not having an item sprite.
  • Fixed the worn sprites for nitrile gloves for Unathi and Tajara.

Geeves updated:

  • Golems now use descriptors instead of numbers to form their name.

05 April 2020

Alberyk, Kyres1, Happy_fox updated:

  • Added z-level interactions to vehicles; hovering vehicles will now run over holes, while non-flying ones will fall. You can also use space bikes to move down and up.
  • Added a couple of items seen during the Tajaran Cold War lore arc to the game: monowheels, dynamite, new carpet sprites, padded caps, messa mead keg, schlorrgo, Hadiist lawset, a new bar sign, sugar tree candy and lard.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • The recipe for Lexorin is now a bit more sane. It is now made with a 1:1:1 ratio of tungsten, hydrazine, and ammonia, with 5u of phoron as a catalyst.
  • Alkysine and Imidazoline overdoses now cause minor hallucinations.
  • Dexalin and Dexalin+ now cause brain and eye damage if overdosed.

Ferner updated:

  • Fixed the research shuttle having the wrong console tag.

Furrycactus updated:

  • Added new clothing items for Zeng-Hu contractors; two berets and a labcoat.
  • Fixed the mislabeling of the alternate Zeng-Hu uniform, it's now named 'zeng-hu white uniform' instead of 'zeng-hu black uniform', because it is in fact white and not black.

Geeves updated:

  • Tweaked how xenobio spawns in steel, plasteel and phoron, when using slime extracts. They will make more of each now.
  • The gray extract now spawns 4 monkey cubes instead of 3.
  • Injecting phoron into a gold extract now spawns small amounts of gold, silver, and uranium.
  • Slime core batteries now regain 10% of their charge every minute.
  • The slime extract EMP now has a five second timer, instead of being instant.
  • The oil extract flame now affects a slightly larger area, one tile to a one tile radius.
  • The frost extract now properly chills every in a seven tile radius.
  • Cryopod computers now globally track stored crewmembers.
  • Cryopods now properly store specific items upon its wearer cryoing.
  • Succumbing no longer needs massive brain damage to work, it is much easier to kill yourself.
  • Added a box in the Autolathe Engineering section that can hold the stock parts that goes into machinery.
  • Standard Encryption Keys now come with both Common and Entertainment channels in-built.

MattAtlas, Fernerr updated:

  • Shuttle code has been completely reworked.
  • Shuttles can now be modified to have more than one destination.
  • Shuttles now have a takeoff sound.
  • You can now throw mobs against walls to damage them. A lot.
  • You now need a neckgrab to throw mobs.
  • BEING UNBUCKLED DURING SHUTTLE LAUNCH IS DANGEROUS! Don't do it.
  • Adminghosts can now interact with all shuttles.

04 April 2020

BRAINOS, Ferner, Kyres1 updated:

  • Replaced the mining rig sprites with new ones by BRAINOS. Construction states by Kyres1.

Geeves updated:

  • Fixed tacshield sprites not existing.
  • Vaurca warriors now need a strangling grip to mandible bite someone. The hard cooldown has increased to ten seconds.
  • Vaurca warriors can no longer do the mandible bite through face-covering helmets and masks.
  • Goggle overlays like mesons, thermal and science have been made less extreme.
  • Goggle overlays are now always on-screen, instead of only being a 15x15 block around the player.
  • Implemented craftable railings.

Goret updated:

  • Added a Chem Master at the surface garden.

03 April 2020

Geeves updated:

  • Added the Drill Technician alt-title to Shaft Miner. They come equipped with a kit to set up a barebones drill mining operation.
  • Shaft Miners now come with a KA kit that allows them to give slight upgrades to their roundstart Kinetic Accelerator.
  • Pumping a kinetic accelerator no longer spams your log, only giving a message every ten seconds since the last one. Sound and charge amount remains the same.
  • Fixed being unable to rotate mining braces. Fixed the message saying that you can rotate drill heads.
  • Large mining drills now have lights attached to them, which differ in colour and brightness depending on current activity.
  • Added the Orbital Drill Dropper to the mining vendor, for 3250 mining points a pop.
  • Mining light beacons now come in stacks of 25 instead of stacks of 5. This'll make them slightly more useful for showing a taken path.
  • Ore satchels no longer show that they have a warp pack installed on examine, if they do not have one installed.
  • Alt clicking a rotatable item doesn't open the turf menu anymore.
  • Ladders can now be used to grip to prevent floating away, when there isn't gravity or when in space.
  • Mobile ladders can now be alt-clicked to be taken down. Mobile ladders now go into your hands when successfully folded.
  • Psi Ping's description has been fixed to say help intent instead of disarm intent.
  • Blindstrike and commune no longer overlap.
  • Illegal KAs have been fixed and will now work.
  • Illegal KA pump will now store more charge and give a BIG CHARGE to its cell in a single pump.
  • Modular Laser Prototypes now correctly get their attachment sprites on the in-hand sprite.

Wowzewow (Wezzy), r4d6 updated:

  • New RPD and RFD derivative sprites (and inhands).

02 April 2020

Furrycactus updated:

  • Adds more belts and stethoscopes to sublevel storage, regular ones and EMT ones too to offer choice. If people run out now then I'll be very concerned.
  • Takes the EMT/Paramedic hyposprays and puts them on the table in their cave, instead of tucked in both the wall lockers.
  • Adds a couple of GPS units to sublevel storage.
  • Adds bandages and ointment to the NanoMed machines.

Geeves updated:

  • You can now rotate anchored chairs, such as comfy chairs and the such.
  • A check for total health no longer counts fire damage twice.

01 April 2020

Alberyk updated:

  • Increased the scientist and xenobiologist job minimum age to 30 years old.
  • Increased the research director job minimum age to 35 years old.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Prosthetic stomachs can now be produced in the mechfab.
  • Prosthetic stomachs now have proper robotic names and sprites.
  • Added Pneumalin, a medication that is targeted to fix lung damage, which should decrease reliance on peridaxon. Make it by using a 1:1:1 ratio of cough syrup, copper, and pulmodeiectionem. Overdoses above 15u, causing a dangerous drop in a person's pulse.
  • Removed inaprovaline. Replaced all bottles and syringes with norepinephrine. Itching and cramps are now relieved by norepinephrine.
  • Dylovene is now less effective at treating hallucinations. Use synaptizine.
  • Adipemcina no longer relies on or affects a person's nutrition level to function. It also metabolizes a little faster.
  • Removed adrenaline effects from norepinephrine.
  • Kelotane will no longer heal burns if dermaline is present in a person's system. It will metabolize with no effect until the dermaline is gone.
  • Dermaline now recovers the proper amount of burn damage, instead of being equivalent to kelotane.
  • Deltamivir will no longer cause organ-boiling fevers at 20u dosage. It will still cause a slight fever, so keep that in mind!

Geeves updated:

  • Reverted the TacShield sprite to the old sprite.
  • The description for the random visitor anti-no-record-meta ghost role has been improved.
  • Powered crossbows now have the correct sprite.
  • Powered crossbow no longer enable the user to create infinite metal by superheating, breaking, and weldering its ammunition.
  • Reveal runes now reveal runes. Joy.
  • Added an examine to runes that tells you whether you can talismanify them or not, if you're a cultist.
  • Janitorial Cyborgs can no longer delete holograms by running them over. That's fucking funny.

YourDaddy117 updated:

  • Adds a new blue security armband to the loadout. Also adds the detective uniforms to the loadout and changes the names of the default detective/forensic tech uniforms.
  • Murders that dumb green trenchcoat.

31 March 2020

Alberyk updated:

  • Robotics R&D consoles can no longer interact with protolathe and destructive analyzer.
  • Robot parts and some basic mech stuff had their time and price reduced.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Removed soporific from Nanomed vending machines.

Ferner updated:

  • Fixed some corner floor decals being inconsistent at some angles.

Geeves updated:

  • Ghosts can now hear non-verbal speaking from afar without stars appearing.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Flashbangs no longer stun people.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Adds inhand sprites for stackable items, namely material sheets, tiles, medical kits, wrapping paper and nanopaste.

30 March 2020

Geeves updated:

  • Mechfabs can now properly print prosthetics with manufacturers.
  • Borgs can now work with airlock electronics again.
  • Bluespace mining is now possible, to do so, attach a warp extraction pack to a mining satchel, then a warp extraction beacon signaller to an ore box. Link them by clicking on the ore box with the satchel.
  • You can attach a linked mining satchel to a mining drill to teleport mined ores to the connected ore box.
  • Mining satchel beacons can be removed with a screwdriver, mining drill satchels by wrench, and ore box beacons by hand.

ReadThisNamePlz updated:

  • Made all animals names lower case, like Lizard is now lizard, etc. Ian, Chauncey, etc.. still have capital names.
  • Allows Military Belts to hold Tactical Knives and Tactical Riot Shields"

29 March 2020

Geeves updated:

  • You can now put flags on windows without bashing them.
  • Compartmental circuit kits no longer display pickup error messages when you put it back in the big box.
  • Apprentice scrolls no longer spawn wizard garb, instead giving them the no clothes spell. Enjoy.
  • Apprentices now get a Return to Master spell.
  • Return to Master has been given more smokey flair.
  • Apprentices now get Disable Tech, Entangle, Knock.

28 March 2020

Alberyk updated:

  • Replaced two references to ISD with security department to match the rest of the game.

Geeves updated:

  • Everything in mechfab and RnD consoles has been re-ordered and tweaked in some way, it should be organized better now.
  • Fixes the Circuit Imprinter not printing.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Adds some more underwear options, one courtesy of Aticius.
  • Makes tight tanktops and binders recolorable.

YourDaddy117 updated:

  • Updated the Green Trenchcoat to make it less awful.

27 March 2020

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Adjusted how explosive implants are set. You will no longer get the settings prompts when injecting. Use them in-hand to change the settings, instead.
  • When you put an explosive implant into an implanter, it tells you the setting and trigger phrase. If you did not set a phrase, it will generate and give you a fallback code word.
  • Explosive implants now spawn out of the implanter when the box is ordered from the uplink, to make it easier to use in-hand. Uplink description edited to inform people how to use it.
  • Localized limb settings for explosive implants no longer gib the person. They just explode the limb. They can now explode outside a person's body, but it won't do much.

Ferner, Happy_Fox, Kyres1 updated:

  • Replaced many commonly used station art assets with new ones, custom made by Kyres1 and Happy_Fox.
  • Tweaked a lot of areas of the station to make best use of these new assets.

Geeves updated:

  • RFD-P will no longer use up their resource if put into a storage container.
  • Invisible admin/CCIA only ghostroles no longer cause the Unique Ghost Role is available prompt.

26 March 2020

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Chaplain's holy water flask no longer disappears when empty. It's a miracle.

Geeves updated:

  • Tweaked how various bee related items work, subtle non-intended differences might be noticeable, however all should be positive.
  • Examining a beehive now gives you more information. It's still better to use a plant analyzer on it to get detailed information, however.
  • Bees now only get angry AFTER you disassemble their hive, not when you click it with a screwdriver. Gives you some time to cancel the move.
  • Bees in a beehive now affect the yield of plants in view, having a positive effect the more bees there are. They also still positively benefit plant health.
  • Examining the honey extractor now shows whether it contains a frame, and its centrifuge action now only takes 10 seconds, down from 20.
  • Tweaked the bee smoker's examine a little. Nothing new, but it should look better now.
  • Tweaked some bee smoker messages to look better.
  • Added available unique ghost spawner roles to the late join menu.
  • Added station alert level to the late join menu.
  • Added selected character name to the default join menu.
  • It is now impossible to attack people with unarmed attacks while incapacitated.
  • Implements a Piping Rapid Fabrication Device, otherwise known as the RFD-P.
  • Alt-clicking changes what types of pipes you can select, clicking on it in-hand or pressing Z while it's in your active hand will let you choose a specific pipe.
  • Added a framework to easily attach signalers to any type of machinery, codewise.
  • You can now place a signaler on an emitter to remotely activate it. It follows the same activation rules as a standard user.
  • EMPing an emitter now causes it to toggle its state, if it's ready to fire.
  • Emagging an emitter now doubles the amount of burst shots it takes and halves the minimum and maximum times between bursts.
  • Tweak the message signalers vocalize when they receive a message. Tweak the look and feel of emitters, try examining them sometime.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Kois spores no longer infect Vaurca.
  • Removed extra move delay on a lot of automatic guns.
  • Fixed recoil not working properly.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Removes a superfluous tank inhand.

25 March 2020

Geeves updated:

  • Removed Spatial as a possible Wizard Spellbook.
  • Gave wizards and apprentices more spell points across the board in return for losing all teleportation abilities.
  • Wizard apprentices gain mend, forcewall, shadow shroud, wizard voidsuit, monster manual, raise dead. Wizards should try to get apprentices where possible.
  • You can now store debuggers in tool belts.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Cryo no longer heals organ damage.

24 March 2020

PoZe updated:

  • Kinnetic accelerator AOE spread now uses iterative approach instead of recursive, possibly reducing stupid bugs.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Adds a new operating table sprite.

23 March 2020

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Made adjustments to liver filtration and alcohol strength. You should be able to get drunk again and will stay drunk slightly longer.
  • Robotic/assisted livers are now very slightly better at filtering out booze.
  • Fixed a message from the fake injection hallucination effect showing up improperly.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Silicons can no longer be renegades.
  • Fixes limbs not properly updating after being removed by damage.

Mwahahahaha, The Stryker updated:

  • Splits the underwear into top and bottom pieces.
  • Allows underwear to be removed.
  • Ports some many more underwear, undershirt, socks styles from BS12, Polaris, tg, as well as some made by The Stryker, using this new system.
  • Backpack styles (job-specific or grey) no longer keep changing back to job-specific.

Skull132 updated:

  • Antag drafting from voters is now limited to just the bare minimum required to boot the round. Previous iteration could over-saturate the pool, making most of the antags be voters and not those who had the round enabled.

22 March 2020

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Reorganized the booze-o-mat. It should be less of a hunt to find things now.
  • Hot coco now vends in a disposable cup instead of a ceramic mug.
  • Shakers and teapots will no longer be melted by acid. Feel free to mix Acid Spit all you want.
  • Fixes empty icons for vended coffee/ramen not showing up.
  • Organizes drink code a bit to make it easier to add empty/trash sprites for drinks in the future.

Geeves updated:

  • Produce boxes now spawn 15 produce items instead of 12.
  • Reduced the types of produce that spawns in produce boxes to produce that actually have recipes.

Skull132 updated:

  • Reimplemented the drafting of antagonists from round voters if there are not enough candidates otherwise.

21 March 2020

Geeves updated:

  • Plasma cutters can now have their power cells removed with screwdrivers, and replaced by using the power cells on them.
  • Plasma cutters now do 20 damage, up from 15.
  • More things can now be disassembled with the plasma cutter. Non-reinforced walls, non-reinforced tables, grills, machine frames.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Adds new inhands for janitorial, hydroponic, medical and tank items.
  • Adds missing icons for upgraded scalpels in the surgery tray.

20 March 2020

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed species temperature discomfort messages not working.
  • Fixed the spicy Ras'val clams spawning with a broken reagent, also changed the recipe to match it now; it should use capsaicin instead of black pepper.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Hallucination handling has been totally overhauled by taking, modifying and tremendously expanding on Bay's system. Goodbye, 2012 hallucination code.
  • Removed the following hallucination effects: Fake HUD updates, items spawning in your hand, 'fake death', and pun-pun attacking you.
  • Added over a dozen new categories of potential hallucination effects. Some are subtle, some are more overt. Increased the variety of previously-existing hallucination effects.
  • Added several large lists of prompts that should keep hallucinations varied and interesting for a long time. These can also easily be expanded upon!
  • Sounds will have less reverb while hallucinating, so you probably won't need to tear your headset off while resisting a cult conversion.
  • Created a subsystem for hallucinations. Larger prompt lists were added as text files.

Geeves, Kyres updated:

  • Added the ability to defuse various bombs with wirecutter-like tools, as well as implementing a specialized bomb-defusal tool that spawns in EOD closets, which is not absolutely guaranteed to work.

Leudoberct updated:

  • Allows CCIA agents to spawn as Skrell.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Projectiles now have impact sounds.
  • Shooting mobs now creates a small blood splatter.
  • Simple animals now bleed when they are shot.

19 March 2020

DanseMacabre updated:

  • Swaps out some gunshot noises for superior versions.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Heads of staff can no longer start as on-station antags except as revolutinaries, loyalists, renegades, or borer hosts. They can still be converted to antag (such as through cult or vampire). They cannot be picked for traitor through autotraitor.

Geeves updated:

  • Reduced long-range artifact effect max range from 200 tiles, to 20.

18 March 2020

DanseMacabre updated:

  • Swapped out the icons for the soda machine, stool, and grilles for a few nicer ones.

Geeves updated:

  • You can now convert ghetto PSU boards back into standard APC power control modules by using a multi-tool.
  • Fixed up a lot of mining-related things in the backend. You might notice some changes in-game.
  • Locked abandoned crates found in the mine now has 15 attempts to hack instead of 10.
  • Destroying artifacts while mining now longer has long range effects on many people.
  • Increased the damage tools do so they aren't on the same level as punching.
  • Added extended descriptions to circuitboards which makes it easier to understand what the hell they do.
  • Structures and machinery got their layers altered so that objects appear above them.

MattAtlas updated:

  • You can now altclick extinguisher cabinets to close them.
  • You can now altclick droppers to set the transfer rate.

17 March 2020

Geeves updated:

  • Engineering Apprentices now spawn with toolbelts. Atmos Techs now spawn with a pipe wrench and analyzer.
  • Screwdrivers and wrenches no longer spawn in engineer belts, they spawn with the impact wrench.
  • The Chief Engineer now starts with an industrial tier welding tool.
  • You can no longer rip up floor tiles and such when on harm intent. Beating people with tools is now sadly less humorous.
  • Pipe wrench colours are now random.
  • Debuggers can now fix software errors in vending machines, shooting their inventory and advertising aggressively.
  • The time it takes for the debugger to fix APCs have been reduced by half.
  • Various difficult to click sprites, metal rods, IV drips, syringes and medical tape splints have been given one pixel invisible outlines to make them easier to click.

MattAtlas updated:

  • You can now alt click rotatable objects to rotate them.
  • Objects that can be rotated will now tell you in their description.

16 March 2020

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed round start delay caused by cyborgs choosing their names.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Being in a stasis bag will properly render you unconscious.
  • Plastic surgery should now properly update sprites when fixing a husked individual. This should now work for shells, as well.
  • You can no longer set a fire alarm timer to longer than ten minutes.
  • Gun safeties should prevent suicides if the user is not on harm intent.
  • The mechfab can now produce right feet.

Geeves updated:

  • Fixed the name of some Ouerean dishes to properly display their real name.
  • Clicking an unlocked airlock electronic with another unlocked airlock electronic will now copy the configuration from the one in your active hand to the clicked one.
  • Clicking an airlock electronic with an ID or PDA with an ID in it will now toggle its lock.
  • Airlock eletronics are now one size smaller, meaning you can jam more of them into a pack.
  • Having brain damage no longer prevents you from operating airlock electronics.

MattAtlas updated:

  • The ERT chances should now be a little less wonky.
  • After hacking an APC with an emag, you can now hack it again to infect it and enslave IPCs that charge from it.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Decreases volume of some looping sounds.
  • Updates and fixes some badge sprites.

15 March 2020

Chada-1 updated:

  • Altered the misaligned TC-Drone overlays to where they're properly floating with the 'borg sprite now.
  • Added Fren overlay changes and animations at the request of their player.
  • FIxed the Maint. Drone movestate, it was one pixel forward so didn't sync up right with the overlay when it moved..

Geeves updated:

  • Roof solars start wired, SMES starts set. Interact with the solar control computer to connect the devices.

14 March 2020

AmoryBlaine updated:

  • Resprites grenades.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Animals eating food in their tile will no longer produce random trash items, and will be deleted properly when finished.

Geeves updated:

  • Particle accelerator parts can now be altered with the powered drill.
  • Tweaked some particle accelerator backend stuff, no gameplay changes, though text and descriptions might look prettier now.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Fixes missing/invisible book inhand sprites.

13 March 2020

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Fixed some invisible bottle sprites.
  • T-borg tonic water cans no longer spawn empty.
  • Carton dropsounds tweaked to be less like glass and more like cardboard.
  • Large soda bottles vended from the booze-o-mat now behave like plastic bottles instead of glass ones.

Geeves updated:

  • Tweaked a hell of a lot of silicon code to make synthetics better.
  • Synths with scrambled codes that prevent them from being on robotics computers will now appear on Merc camera networks.
  • Both variants of the engineering borg can now deploy the malf borging machine.
  • Medical borgs no longer get polyacid sprays, instead getting Wulumunusha CMO Hyposprays, which cause muteness.
  • You must now be on help intent to use items like crowbars and screwdrivers on borgs. Otherwise you hit them with it.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Dionae resist modifier has been nerfed from 3 to 2. It should be easier to hold them in place now.

12 March 2020

Alberyk updated:

  • Loyalty implants have been rebranded to be mind shield implants instead.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Nymphs have much less health (85 real health/510 effective health to 33.3 health/199.8 effective health).
  • Nymphs require a bit more nutrition to form a gestalt.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Adds new book inhands and even more book sprites for variety.
  • Tweaks the bookshelf sprites.

11 March 2020

Alberyk, Kyres1 updated:

  • Added a new icelance rifle sprite.

AmoryBlaine updated:

  • Weapon resprites.
  • Medical crate/kit re-recolour.The green cross now matches all other uses of green in medical.

Chada-1 updated:

  • Added the new 'Arachnotronic' sprite line to replace the old spiderborg sprites, the alpha and omega of the Spider Drone series of Synths, for now...
  • Adjusted all of the old Drone sprites to have really neat new overlays.
  • Removed the old spiderborg sprite from the available options.
  • Removed the Repo-Icarus-Drone series by popular request, I guess it really doesn't match the others in quality. :(
  • Animated *all* of the legacy treaded and spiked 'borg sprites to have a walking animation, it's just like the drones'..

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Adds the ability to shake the drinks shaker. (doesn't actually do anything, just sounds cool.).

  • Allows Aut'akh Unathi to spawn as the IAC ERT roles.

Ferner updated:

  • Tweaked the equipment the IAC team gets supplied with.

Geeves updated:

  • Cyborgs' and robots' MMIs, Posibrains, or Robotic Circuits, will now receive their name designation when a name is picked.

  • Diona nymph is no longer immortal.

  • Fixes mesmetron watch hypnosis.

03 March 2020

Chada-1 updated:

  • Removed all of the old humanoid legacy sprites from the available module options.
  • Replaced the Spiderborgs with the 'Unbranded Android' (The exoskeleton with a visible posibrain and a v. intricate electricity animation)
  • Removed *all* of the red crosses from the 'borg sprites, they're green now.
  • Created eye overlays for all of my old treadmate/landmate sprite recolors and streamlined their sprite names to be consistent among every variant including the legacy ones.
  • Created a new Treadhead sprite and eye overlays and recolor it for every department.
  • Created new toiletbot sprites and eye overlays recolored them for every department.
  • Implemented a new 'borg eye overlay system that allows locking them to intent, help or harm. I've decided to go with green for help and blue for harm.
  • Created the new SD-MAD hoverbot series.
  • Created the new off-brand MAD hoverbot series.
  • Added the new HD-MAD series.
  • Added the new Repo-Icarus-Drone series.
  • Recolored the Medical 'Droid sprite for every department, making it less medical and more multipurpose looking.
  • Removed the heavy sprite series from available sprite options.
  • Added the new 'Tau-Ceti-Drone' (Old Drone sprite) by popular request.
  • Re-added the Heavy and Spiderborgs with recolors and updated them to the new system by request of Wezzy..

Leudoberct updated:

  • Removes unnecessary blastdoors in the research sublevel.

01 March 2020

Ferner updated:

  • Wearers of Eldritch armour no longer stroll around on their tippy toes.
  • Made some centcom areas use a more appropiate base turf.

Furrycactus updated:

  • Tablet computers can now run the Medical Suit Sensors Monitoring program.
  • All head of staff laptops possess a Command and Communications Program now.
  • The Captain's laptop has an ID card reader now, so that the ID Card Modification program can actually be used.

  • Removes recently added icon state unit test due to BYOND issues.

Ferner updated:

  • Fixed the floors at centcom that had become white instead of being plating.

  • IPCs can now be Necropolis contractors. However, they cannot be corp reps.
  • Tajara can only be NT/Independent corp reps.

Talkarcabbage updated:

  • Fixed sound loops ignoring volume setting.
  • Adjusted supermatter crystal sounds and fix issue where it always plays at 100 volume.

27 February 2020

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Drinks should no longer disappear when empty.
  • Fixed wrong messages and invisible items when feeding others.

Geeves updated:

  • Fixed Diona Floors being difficult to remove. Use a shovel.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Adds a cobra hood for Unathi.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Prosthetics printer can now also print hands and feet. It is necessary to print these in addition to an arm/leg if you are doing a full limb replacement.

26 February 2020

Chinsky & ParadoxSpace updated:

  • There are now random colored Silversun shirts. Two in the mixed wardrobe.

DanseMacabre updated:

  • Fixes an issue with the mob sprites for the detective's handgun

Ghostsheet updated:

  • Voidsuit can now be adjusted in hand (but not worn).
  • Voidsuit tank can be ejected from adjacent range.
  • Voidsuit adjustment now has more sound effects for audio feedback
  • KA will now properly display their safety icon.
  • KA will now properly hit their user if they're caught in the blast radius.
  • Mining vendor will now display 0 mining points inside of nothing

YourDaddy117 updated:

  • Replaces varsity jackets with new sprites that have both an opened and closed state. Also gives them pockets.

25 February 2020

Geeves updated:

  • The unknown transport signature can now bring something more interesting on-station.
  • Fixed the golem ghostspawner being enabled at all times and producing an error message.

24 February 2020

Geeves updated:

  • Fixes pAI using RIG modules spamming the admins.
  • Cultifying an area now cultifies the table and airlocks as well, with some high security exceptions.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • New trash states for cup ramen and coffee cups! Check them out!
  • Tweaks some drink and bottle sprites, namely soda cans. Alcohol bottles have empty states now.
  • New paper cup sound and tweaks the coffee vend sound again.

23 February 2020

Ferner updated:

  • Added an uplink option to purchase a random projectile weapon from a wide selection. Expect varying quality.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Offworlders can now be CE.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Added a unit-test to check for invalid default icon_states.
  • Successfully firing a gun or sprayer while cloaked by a RIG stealth module will deactivate your cloak.
  • Health analyzer will now report a rough radiation level for a scanned patient.
  • Emotes from Borers inside a host will only be shown to their host.
  • Mech arm attacks now produce attack logs.
  • Character setup record setting options now have a clear button, submitting a blank record or clicking cancel will no longer clear it.

22 February 2020

Geeves updated:

  • Tweaked how gunjamming works. You now have to spam the Z button, or keep clicking the gun sprite if you don't have hotkeys, to unjam it.
  • Added sounds to jamming and unjamming guns.
  • Allows Vaurca to carry small items in their suit slot, using their smol vestigial arms.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • The bar now has access to Root Beer in its drink dispenser.
  • Lights will now work properly when inside clothing assemblies.
  • Lighting ICs now only illuminate a cone infront of them, like flashlights.
  • Lighting ICs now do not produce UV.
  • Spawning on Aurora via the centcomm timeout will no longer duplicate your character's items.

21 February 2020

Ghostsheet updated:

  • Hot Drinks machine no longer has transparent pixels.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Laying a new flooring tile no longer deletes the air on that turf.

20 February 2020

Geeves updated:

  • Fixes Vaurca Breeders and Warforms having arterial bleeding.
  • Tweaked the mining drone lawset to be a little more sane.
  • Upgraded cyborg KA's to be a bit better to use.
  • Allowed mining drones to speak normal languages.
  • Removed drone and robot speak from mining drones.
  • Allowed mining drones to pull ore boxes.
  • Removed the ability to recycle mining drones, you can only reboot them now by swiping your ID.
  • Removed the ability for mining drones to print reports. They can speak now.
  • Installing a KA upgrade onto a mining drone will no longer delete its upgraded drill.
  • Increased the capacity of the mining drone's default orebag.
  • Gave the mining drone a Screwdriver, a GPS, a working jetpack, and a stack of rods.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Synthetic humans don't get knocked out by Operating Tables anymore. The suppressor will still turn on/off.
  • Robots won't separately have their MMIs announced by the Arrivals Shuttle Oversight.

19 February 2020

Geeves updated:

  • Added the Acolytes gamemode, featuring borer and cult.
  • Fixes cult constructs not having their health HUD show up.
  • Fixes pylons shooting mechs and stuff willy nilly.
  • Increased Wraith construct health slightly.
  • Gave the Artificer the ability to cultify turfs in an area, Daemon Forges and Altars.
  • Gave constructs non-numerical randomized names, credits to Kaed.
  • Added a new gamemode, Insurrection, which features Borers and Revolutionaries.
  • Added wristbound computers, to be used in future developments.

Scheveningen updated:

  • Most forms of flashes/blinds, especially mounted flashers, now confuse organics after blinding.
  • Confusion has been buffed up a bit to make you move in an unintended direction a bit more often.
  • Pocket flashes have had their break chance lowered, and unified together and now don't have a ridiculous chance of breaking for manually using them. This mechanic was a problem for too many years, sorry.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • PDAs have a boop noise when you press buttons now.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Robots moving away while someone tries to crowbar them open/closed will now properly cancel the opening/closing.
  • Removing an assembly light will now turn the light off.
  • Diona will no longer split into nymphs when they cryo.
  • Psychiatrists now show up on the PDA messenger as medical staff.
  • Holstered guns keep their safety icons.
  • Crowbars have a sound effect again.
  • Can now clear records in character setup by making them blank and submitting.
  • Removes mention of the 'Halogen Counter', as it was not implemented and does not make sense with the server's radiation system.
  • Prosthetic external organs from the Prosthetics (External) tab of the mechfab are now only for surgery on human-mobs, and are now properly attachable. For robots use the robotic limbs that are now in the 'Robot' tab of the fabber.
  • Spawning as a golem no longer tells you to serve your ghostmob.
  • Looping timers now work properly. This will affect looped sounds primarily.
  • Remote robots are no longer valid targets for autotraitor.

18 February 2020

MattAtlas updated:

  • Welders and cable coil now automatically repair external damage on robotic limbs. No more spam clicking.
  • Tweaked how welders inflict eye damage. Shouldn't be much of a difference to player.
  • Bolded the amount of cables in the cable coil examine description.
  • Fixed flamethrower construction.
  • Fixed some buggy messages while applying cable coil to robotic limbs.

Pratepresidenten updated:

  • Solidifies the organ cooler further!

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Medical cyborg roller bed rack now has an icon.

17 February 2020

Ferner updated:

  • Announcements can now be heard on the roof (z-level 7).

  • Added a new type of linoleum, rubber carpets, dark/light metal grates. Added some proper footramp damaged states. All spriting by Happy_Fox
  • Blue/Green Circuit tiles can now be made in the autolathe.
  • Blown up footramps will no longer result in a 'Fix me!' icon appearing.

Geeves updated:

  • Fixed Manifest Ghost not working for cultists.
  • Fixed cultists being unable to summon soulstones and constructs.

Goret updated:

  • The library has been given some slight changes.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Fixes Fax Machine UI not opening.
  • Scanning slimes with only two mutation possibilities will now display the two possibilities instead of just the second one.

16 February 2020

Geeves updated:

  • Made mechs a bit better to work with behind the scenes, as well as put some future goodies into work.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Burning crumpled paper should show the proper animation now.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Fixes lack of chat tags.
  • Fixes runtime on the Player Panel.
  • Records console UIs should now display properly.
  • Wearing clothing that provides armour along with clothing that does not no longer results in your character having zero armour.

15 February 2020

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Changes the hypospray sprite again.
  • CMO's hypospray should have a inhand again.
  • Reagents inside syringes and hyposprays should be more visible now.
  • Made hypospray descriptions much more descriptive.

14 February 2020

Geeves updated:

  • Added two librarian alt-titles. Tech Support, which handles.. IT stuff, such as resetting devices, and Curator, which handles display of artifacts, as well as pricing things with their price scanner.
  • Added the tech support card, which can reset devices to their original state, as well as vend devices from the laptop vendor for free.
  • Made some tweaks and additions to the Security Checkpoint on the surface and roof. Most notably, the addition of a roof recharger, extra set of binoculars, and security laptop.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Fixes things such as dry rags and buckets shattering once and for all.

13 February 2020

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed the Corporate Liaison's minimum age, it should be 30 now.

  • Fixes some bureaucracy sprites, and writing on cigarette filters.

12 February 2020

Arrow768 updated:

  • The CCIA shuttle automatically returns to CentCom.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Meat and cutlets should now be able to be properly sliced by edged items, such as regular kitchen knives, hatchets, and cleavers.
  • When slicing meat and cutlets, their reagents should now properly transfer to the new products.
  • Slipping items into food has changed slightly to prevent weird interactions. You will now only slip items into food on harm intent. Now you can actually slice things with the cleaver instead of shoving it into that dough or cheese wheel.
  • You can no longer slice throats with spoons or forks.

Geeves updated:

  • Added a new shirt accessory. A Silversun shirt.

Yonnimer updated:

  • Fixes a issue with the aooctoggle pr.

11 February 2020

AmoryBlaine updated:

  • Better balaclavas, more variation.
  • Recolours the red and blue bandanas. They're both a bit darker now.

Geeves updated:

  • Slimes are now content after growing into adults or reproducing, meaning they won't attack humanoids for a while afterwards.
  • The slime scanner has been tweaked to be a bit nicer.
  • Slightly reduced the damage slimes do.
  • Clicking a delivery chute with a held animal, such as a monkey, will now automatically deposit them into it.

  • Increases pickaxes and drill efficiency across the board.

  • Slightly modifies the KA Damage upgrade towards more damage, slower rate of fire
  • Mining now get's exploited by the company and not the other departments.

AmoryBlaine updated:

  • Resprited folders.
  • Fixes holobadge placement.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Fixes some bugs with GPSes that caused 'track all' and other features to function incorrectly sometimes.
  • The Mech Camera Network no longer shows up on the general camera monitoring program.
  • Fixed some small bugs with new bodyscanner UI. Nothing that is noticable by players.

08 February 2020

Arrow768 updated:

  • Removes random PDA message interception from the AI.

Code by Geeves, Sprites by Wezzy updated:

  • Added a hearing aid item. Also added it to the Utility catagory in the loadout menu. There are two designs, Skrellian and Human. Both designs work for any species.

Geeves updated:

  • Fixed some cult item descriptions not having a full stop
  • The final remnants of the cultwords code has been ripped out.
  • Cult blades and tomes now fit on the belt slot.
  • Talismans now display what their copied runes are when examined.
  • The tome has been simplified and shortened. Should be easier for new people to use now.
  • Blood boil can no longer randomly gib people.
  • The freedom rune now handles cultist saving a bit better. Should be more useful now. Alerts the rescued cultist that their cult is doing things to help.
  • You no longer have to stay on the rune to keep your manifested ghost alive, but you'll still take continual damage until it's dispelled.
  • Raising the dead no longer needs you to kill someone on a rune, but it will cause them to lose some limbs.
  • The stun talisman now affects non-cultists in a two tile radius around you.
  • Teleport runes now have four distinct teleport networks you can choose from. They will connect and beam to eachother.
  • Teleport runes now display which network they're connected to when examined.
  • Trying to summon a ghostly apparition now announces the effort to deadchat and gives them a follow link to jump to it.
  • The freedom rune can now open bolted airlocks.
  • Cultist clothes now get turned into eldritch voidsuits when cultified. Find out how to do so.
  • The daemon forge can now be used to cultify objects.
  • IPCs can now scribe runes, and do more rune based stuff in general.
  • Runes now take the colour of the blood of the person who drew them. Remember to be stealthy.
  • Cult structures (altars, forges and desks) have now been given some use. Examine them as an antag to find out their secrets.

Kaedwuff updated:

  • Removes gemstones.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Lowered the threshold at which you fall down in paincrit.
  • Melee weapons no longer have a chance to RNG knockdown when aiming for the chest.
  • Being unconscious no longer removes some of your pain.
  • Shrapnel no longer causes direct damage. It now adds pain to the organ the shrapnel is in.
  • Lasers now evaporate less blood, but deal more pain.
  • Arterial bleeding is now MUCH nastier.
  • Ballistics now suffer a lower damage penalty after damaging organs.
  • Toxins have been nerfed overall.
  • Buffed the liver's breaking threshold.
  • Ballistics now inflict slightly more pain.
  • Fixes being able to edit other peoples' flavour texts.

07 February 2020

Alberyk updated:

  • Removed stealth changeling absorb DNA power.
  • Fixed horror ling changeling mobs not destroying the human inside of them properly when killed.

PoZe updated:

  • Merchant trading program now accepts Kataphract Trader acces.

02 February 2020

01 February 2020

Geeves updated:

  • Dionae can now pick Sinta'Azaziba at character selection.
  • Brig Timers now announce when they end to Sec Huds.
  • Fixed HeadRevs not having access to the Revolution catagory.
  • Biomass is now less strong.
  • Diona have gotten a ton of minor code improvements, using their abilities should now be a little sane.
  • Diona nymphs don't have to be whitelisted to grow until a full diona now. Administrative action will be taken if this right is abused.
  • Diona gestalts can now use their biomass / arms to create biomass structures.
  • Removed nymphs' ability to open biomass walls. It was buggy.
  • Nymphs can now be holstered and worn on the ear slots.
  • Fixed Hegemony Energy Pistols having the Nanotrasen Energy Pistol description fluff.

Goret updated:

  • Upon breaking, borosilicate glass will now make borosilicate shards.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Diona glow bulbs are no longer dense, and you can weld them to death.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • New ambience noise.
  • Tweaked welding sounds on airlocks and vents. Now after welding you should hear a second sound when you end your action.

  • Adds a Toggle-AOOC verb

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Hardsuit mounted weaponry no longer have safeties, that weren't possible to disable.

31 January 2020

Geeves updated:

  • All the gun sprites have been moved into seperate files, this has no user-facing change, but will likely result in some sprites being missing. Please report missing sprites to Github.
  • The double barrel shotgun can now be wielded.

  • The medical briefing room has been modified. Surgeons should now spawn inside it.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Unathi foot claws are now a pixel taller.

Pratepresidenten updated:

  • Given the roundstart tips some love.
  • De-memefies the Captain's laser gun.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Tweaks headset sprites - should be less visible from the back now.
  • Fixes spoon inhands.
  • Mops, rags, and soap should no longer spam logs as much anymore.
  • Yellow buttons on the paper shredder have been removed on account of looking too similar to a maintenance panel.
  • New animation for shredding different states of paper.
  • Justice hats have been fixed properly this time.
  • Cigar case has been made measurably smaller.
  • You no longer can eat soup with a fork. Weep and/or rejoice.
  • Drinking soup should display more correct messages and sounds.
  • Eating things with utensils will now properly spawns the trash item.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Limb attachment surgery now checks for presence of a suitable organ to attach it to.

29 January 2020

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Species that are gender neutral will now properly spawn with the neuter gender, and be neuter gender in the character setup.

28 January 2020

BoryaTheSlayer updated:

  • Fixes nanopaste not using charge when used for internal robotic repairs.

Geeves updated:

  • Added a default NTNet Relay IRC channel, for everyone to access and congregate at.
  • Removed the user has joined and user has left the channel messages, so you can freely move in the IRC without spamming people.
  • Added the IRC client as a default program to the Private enrollment preset, so you don't have to download it seperately.
  • Renamed the Computer Configuration Tool to Hardware Configuration Tool.
  • Added a basic laptop to the loadout.
  • Increased the DDOS program's DDOSing power a bit.
  • Added Sudoku to the CE's laptop.
  • Ports Bay Modular Computer component sprites.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Commune and Psiping no longer spam staff logs.

Pratepresidenten updated:

  • Added a portable organ cooler

mikomyazaki updated:

  • All guns (except mech guns) now have safeties. CTRL+Click to disable to safety. Firing on harm intent will automatically disable the safety.
  • Removes old pref-based gun safety system.

27 January 2020

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed certains mobs being unable to smash wall girders.

Geeves updated:

  • Added the IAC response team.
  • Added an internals and suit sensors indicator to the strip menu.
  • Toggle internals in the strip menu now displays whether you're toggling it on or off.
  • Added an adjust mask and tank pressure check to the strip menu.

Leudoberct updated:

  • Adds Si'akh to the Unathi religion options.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Monkeys no longer throw or interact with stuff.
  • You can no longer trade easy to get items to Cyndie Kate for stupidly strong weapons.
  • Unathi can no longer swallow mobs or items whole.
  • Instead, they now have their old devour, still tied to a grab. You need a red grab now, however. It does not work on humans.
  • Unathi devour is now overall faster.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Dionae are now a bit slower.

PoZe updated:

  • Added new admin verb inside of Special Verbs called Load Template. It appears when you press Toggle Build Mode. This verb allows admins to load template maps into their current coordinates.
  • Added button to Build Mode buttons UI for load template.

25 January 2020

Geeves updated:

  • Modular Computer .dat files are now more space efficient.

MattAtlas updated:

  • The Medical Doctor role has been split up into two different roles.
  • Medical Doctor is now renamed to Physician and has four slots.
  • Surgeon is now its own standalone role. Two slots.
  • AIs are no longer invincible.
  • Contractor surgeons are now a possibility.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Fixes the classic cowboy boots being invisible.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • New sprites and inhands for glasses! You should see them when you're holding them in your hands, and changing your glasses mode will change the sprite too.
  • Adds new sprites and inhands for mesons. They should be more representative of what they actually do. (Try turning on mesons on and off in your hand and see the magic!)
  • You will no longer clumsily drop your glasses everytime you combine HUDs with them.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Fixed a bug where banning someone from Malf AI, Renegade, Asset Protection Specialist, Syndicate Commando, Highlander or Traitor would ban someone from all of those roles.

24 January 2020

Alberyk, Kyres1 updated:

  • Added new space ruin.
  • Space ruin ghost roles will now only open when the research shuttle is launched from the station.

Geeves updated:

  • Slimecode has been tweaked a bit to make it slightly better. Adult slimes will no longer have their babyname next to their name when they talk.
  • Golems have been added to the ghostspawner menu. You will be able to spawn as one when a golem rune is created.
  • Slime steroids now properly triple uses, like the message says it does.
  • Slimes have had their nutrition values fixed. They will now properly evolve and reproduce.
  • Stunbatonning a slime now has a reduced chance of making them go batshit.

MattAtlas updated:

  • You can now destroy girders and walls with powerful items. It might take some time, though, and you'll probably be better off deconstructing it unless your weapon is strong.
  • Two-handed weapons no longer have that awkward Wielded sticking in front of the name when you wield them.
  • Girders now report their damage status on examine.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Adds two kinds of recolorable pants, dress and striped, as well as a recolorable beret and an alt version of the casual skirt.
  • Adds a non la conical hat.
  • You can now get an armorless version of the TCFL flight jacket in the loadout.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Changelog Changelog - Fixed changelog wiki link.
  • Can no longer move buckled mobs into cryopods.

23 January 2020

Furrycactus updated:

  • Added Hot Chocolate to the bar coffee machine and to soft drink dispensers.
  • Replaced the sprite for a glass of hot chocolate with a proper mug sprite.

Goret updated:

  • Bolted the phonograph in the bar.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Dismantling mech-suits will no longer produce a spooky invisible second mech-suit.
  • Lack of shoes no longer causes a slowdown.

22 January 2020

Ferner updated:

  • Did a round of minor mapfixes, most noticeable the turf oddities that were at the Odin departure lounge.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Fixes the claw markings being a little too long on the left hand side.
  • The Security department jacket now has an NT logo on the back.
  • Adds a department jacket for Service.
  • Increases the wittiness in the department jacket descs by 75%

Yonnimer updated:

  • Allows Dionae to join younger than 17.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Latespawn AI will spawn with their eye in the right location.
  • Limited guest pass max name length to 26 characters instead of 1024.
  • Dying now properly stops your heartbeat.
  • Fixes issue where diona regeneration triggering would depend upon the presence of brain damage, which they never have.

19 January 2020

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Adds painted claw body markings for Unathi.
  • Fixes Tzirzi robe cutting off the hand a little. Fixes facial long bull horns having no icon.

18 January 2020

BoryaTheSlayer updated:

  • Added four pieces of clothing, ported from Polaris: blue dress, dark red dress, crop top, crop dress.

Furrycactus updated:

  • Re-added specialised medical kits to the medical storage room. Toxin, Burn, and an extra Oxygen Deprivation one specifically.
  • Re-added more bloodpacks to medical. Two more O- ones in the ICU and Surgery, and a fridge of assorted bags in storage. Match blood types to patients or calculate compatible blood types, go nuts.

NewOriginalSchwann updated:

  • Fixed a minor typo in the Idris and Necropolis CSI loadout datum. They should now spawn in with the proper ID and uniform.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Diona can be cured of viruses with radiation exposure or radium injections.

17 January 2020

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Offworlder pioneer scarves no longer prevent you from eating or drinking while worn, just like every other scarf.

Geeves updated:

  • Suit coolers now start with high capacity cells.
  • Suit coolers printed at autolathes have no cells.

Goret updated:

  • A phonograph and a cigar case have been added to the bar counter. The cake hat has been moved to the kitchen.
  • Briefcases update! More briefcases have been added to the loadout, and hand-sprites have been reworked. Thanks to Happy_Fox for the sprites and Mwahahahaha for the original code.

Karolis2011 updated:

  • Now atmospheric control consoles (like tank and supermatter) numeric inputs set value on enter key press.

MoondancerPony updated:

  • Nitroglycerin should no longer instantly explode. Oops.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • A vampire's blood drain will now work properly on Skrell who enter Srom during.
  • Skrell who are in Srom will now properly receive the alert about memory loss due to brain damage to their real body.
  • Fixed direction of a right-hand spoon icon.
  • Protolathe and Circuit Printer now properly check for adjacency when being filled with sheets.
  • The 'toggle visibility' verb will now work properly for manifested ghosts.

16 January 2020

Geeves updated:

  • Fixes the Klaxan Kataphract not being selectable.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • You can now cop the TCFL field beret in the loadout.
  • To ensure equivalent exchange, it doesn't have armor anymore.

15 January 2020

Alberyk, Kyres1 updated:

  • Added two new guns; harpoon gun and foldable shotgun.
  • Added a new sprite and firing sound to the silenced pistol.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Added more detailed examine text to the industrial drills. Also clarified a warning message, and added more notifications regarding cell changing.

Geeves updated:

  • Added a bunch of descriptions to the traitor uplink so you can be more sure of what you're buying.
  • Added various new weapons, tools, and kits to the traitor uplink.
  • Various traitor items have had their cost tweaked to bring them into a tighter balance.
  • The Tommygun is now know as the Vintage Sub-Machine gun everywhere.
  • Manhacks are now called Viscerators everywhere.
  • Exosuit droppers and their equipment have both been given their own uplink catagories.
  • Remote IPCs are no longer selectable in the Character Creation menu.

Karolis2011 updated:

  • Added verbs to ghost menu to submit pAI personality and revoke it.
  • Added new VueUI for pAI personality submission.
  • Fixed pAI preferences.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Mech examine now actually has colour and bolding.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Secuity records program now has a dropdown-menu for the criminal status options, instead of a text input field.
  • Cargo shuttle can now send NPC mobs if they are part of an active bounty.
  • Advanced pinpointer can now indicate z-direction toward its target with an overlay on the sides of the screen.

14 January 2020

Furrycactus updated:

  • Reishi mycelium and Ambrosia Vulgaris are now regularly available in the MegaSeed Servitor vendors, rather than being contraband, due to their legality. This means you can vend them in Hydroponics or purchase them in the surface garden without hacking the vendors.

Geeves updated:

  • Fixed powered hammer sprites.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Borer has been added as its own gamemode, requiring 3 borer players and 20 people readied.
  • To be eligible as a borer host you now need the borer antag pref on. If a borer cannot find a suitable host, it will spawn in a randomly positioned landmark.
  • Zorch, the eye laser power, has been made into a lightning arc power instead. It works like before, except it shoots teslabolts.
  • Disable, the EMP ability, has been made into a localized EMP ability. It activates the EMP effect on items. You now activate it by targeting right hand and clicking on items.
  • Increased borer psi awakening chemical cost to 150.
  • Borer psi awakening is now a bit more painful.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Adds an icon for the Internal Affairs stamp.

13 January 2020

Furrycactus updated:

  • Changed the Trauma Physician's uniform to be more in line with the fact that they are doctors and not paramedics. Puke jacket GET GONE.

Geeves updated:

  • Added a Frontier Cowboy gear crate, it's cheaper because it isn't EVA capable, nor has any armour.
  • Gave the whip a two tile hit radius.

Goret updated:

  • Add the flowercrowns to the loadout.

Karolis2011 updated:

  • Fixes 'Track' button on suit sensors for AI.

SierraKomodo updated:

  • Renamed Emergency Physician to Trauma Physician, to better reflect their role as a doctor and not an emergency responder.

12 January 2020

Geeves updated:

  • Jetpacks now properly toggle flight capability when you press the action button.
  • Added a remote controlled Unbranded Frame to the command bunker.

Goret updated:

  • Added a cyborg recharge station in medical. It is located in the custodial closet.

Karolis2011 updated:

  • Bluespace drives have been improved to prevent critical drive failure.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Renegades now spawn with the guns in their backpack.
  • Organs no longer pop out of the body when transplanted.
  • Redaction bone mend no longer mends the bones above the bone break threshold.
  • You can no longer put mobs in potted plants.
  • Monkeys no longer throw things while being held.
  • The silicon computer now starts with an advanced network card, which means much faster downloads.
  • Nerfed pressure damage a bit.
  • Orbital drops now work properly.
  • IVs now ping when the attached person is at less than 90% blood volume.
  • Ported over Bay's liver code. This means that you should no longer get demolished livers insanely fast.
  • Reduced zombie brain HP to 70.
  • The head is now easier to hit.
  • Nerfed the effects from getting hit in the brain while you have brain damage. They only occur at 66 brain damage now. The paralysis and stun inflicted are also gone.
  • Increased the blood loss that lasers deal and decreased the blood loss from fire.
  • Increased the toxin damage slimes give a tiny bit.
  • Succumbing is possible at 66 brain damage instead of 100 now.
  • Brain damage now gives you stuttering instead of slurring.
  • Fixed some pain messages.
  • Shrapnel now does external damage. Be careful, or pack a knife.

11 January 2020

Alberyk, Kyres updated:

  • Fixed TCFL rig shoes not displaying the correct sprites.

Skull132 updated:

  • Updated remote logging capabilities.

Wowzewow (Wezzy), Mwahahahaha updated:

  • Makes the Set Pose box retain its previously inputted information and turns it into a chunky message box instead of a skinny text box.
