04 December 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Added the rosary to the loadout options.
  • The rosary no longer automatically spawns in holy books that have bible sprites.

03 December 2019

Aboshehab updated:

  • TCFL are now properly inclusive. You can select any of the station species when joining as the TCFL.
  • You can now properly join freelancer mercenaries as an IPC
  • Added more options for IRU coats. There are now 3 different types either in black or brown.
  • Idris contractors can join forensic roles.
  • Added gasmasks to officer lockers.

Ferner updated:

  • Reworked the contents of the Legion's garages to work better with the recent mech updates.
  • Added some new exclusive weaponry for Legion combat ripleys.
  • Reworked the way mech decals are added so they get the proper colors applied to them.
  • Fixed some mech equipment that lacked an icon or had the wrong name set.

Geeves updated:

  • Unathi, Vaurca and Tajara no longer always spawn with sandals, loadout shoes will replace them properly.
  • The ninja's RIG is now DNA locked to that SPECIFIC ninja. If ANYONE else wears it, they will activate the anti-intrusion countermeasures.

Kaedwuff updated:

  • Added a new chemical, dextrotoxin. It is made somewhat wastefully with carpotoxin, soporific, and phoron.
  • Dextrotoxin briefly makes it hard to walk straight before paralyzing you. People under the effects of dextrotoxin cannot move or use the radio, but can still speak.
  • Dextrotoxin replaces zombie powder in any antagonist item that previously contained it. Zombie powder is still possible to manufacture.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Adds five more loadout points. Spend them wisely.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Fixes christmas lights north sprite flipping for no reason.
  • Adds a second bartender slot.

kyres1 updated:

  • Added a new set of R&D suits available in toxins, telescience and expedition prep on the sublevel.
  • Resprited the AMI suit.

02 December 2019

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Space A/Cs will now start with a heavy duty cell instead of a basic cell that dies in half a minute.
  • Space A/Cs now heat and cool slightly faster.
  • Space A/Cs can now be emagged, which increases the range they can heat and cool, as well as improving their efficiency. Temperature-sensitive species, Tremble!
  • Interacting with space A/Cs is slightly different. If the panel is closed and you click it, it brings up the interface menu, which allows you to turn it on and off, as well as adjust the temperature. Before, the panel needed to be opened for you to adjust the temperature.
  • Power cells in space A/Cs are no longer removed via menu; if the panel is open, you only need to click with an empty hand to remove it, or click with a cell in-hand to insert it.
  • Borgs should now be able to change the power cells of space A/Cs.

Ferner updated:

  • Fixed some animals missing their inhand sprites. Fixed some wizard familiars missing their sprites.

Geeves updated:

  • Surgery sites now have icon overlays, you can now physically see incisions and retracted ribcages.
  • Roller beds have been buffed to be 80% safe to operate on, up from 75%
  • Using surgery tools on unsafe surfaces (rollerbeds, tables) no longer ATTACKS the patient.
  • Fixed organ repair surgery not properly repairing the organ.

Kaedwuff updated:

  • Xenos can now select colors for their footwraps, instead of just generic white.

MattAtlas updated:

  • You can no longer speak into a radio while restrained.
  • The icon of the device you're using to speak into a radio is no longer shown in a message.

Scheveningen updated:

  • Rechargers, including wall chargers, cyborg rechargers and heavy duty cell chargers - have had their recharge speed increased by 50%. Their power demand has been increased by the same proportion. Their energy efficiency is roughly the same, they are just faster.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Fixes invisible surgeon shoes.
  • Fixes donut boxes examine not working properly, and surgery tray description being one of a donut box.

01 December 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed vox raiders not being given an ID and headset.

Arrow768 updated:

  • You are no longer able to join the game with unacknowledged warnings.
  • Fixes the MoTD not showing.

Furrycactus, Doxxmedearly updated:

  • The month of a certain over-commercialised holiday and tacky decorations has begun. NanoTrasen has seen fit to leave no public hall, break room, Head of Staff (+Quartermaster, how generous) office spared of holiday decor, and no Civilian department workspace bare of tacky flashing holiday lights. They even put a gaudily decorated tree in the bar, with gifts layed under it every shift, and all of the special grass and astroturf on the station has been replaced with Authentic(tm) Snow! Show some holiday spirit, and spend money on the newest flashiest devices for your friends and family.
  • Removed trash and added new items to list of contents for xmas gifts.
  • Cleaned up the list of gift givers by removing some memes and adding new names.
  • Gifts will spawn randomly as small, medium, or large.

Kaedwuff updated:

  • Gemstones now spawn properly. Sorry.

30 November 2019

Aboshehab updated:

  • Manhacks no longer attack ninjas.
  • Fixed Idris caps not showing on mobs.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Allows players to cut down plastic flaps and curtains, using wirecutters or other cutting objects.
  • Allows you to construct all curtains (except plastic curtains) from cloth, requiring two pieces each.
  • Most curtains begin anchored (Medical curtains do not). You can anchor and unanchor curtains with a screwdriver.

Kaedwuff updated:

  • Gemstones can now be found in mined rocks! They come in six different flavors and four sizes, with increasing rarity!
  • Gemstones can be sent to centcomm for extra cargo funds. For now, this is their only function.

SonicGotNuked updated:

  • Reduced Systemoveride time by half

Wowzewow updated:

  • Adds movement states for some animals, and improves sprites of some mobs.

28 November 2019

Ferner, Kyres1 updated:

  • Slightly tweaked the appearance of the legion rig's shoes.

Geeves updated:

  • The guest pass terminal can now give guest passes valid for up to an hour (up from 30 minutes).

MattAtlas updated:

  • Gasping no longer applies extreme amounts of losebreath. Aka, you should recover much much sooner from popped lungs after they're healed.
  • Pulse actually fixed now.

arrow768 updated:

  • The HoS has access to the maint tunnels again.

27 November 2019

MattAtlas updated:

  • Organ damage surgery works correctly now.
  • Dead people no longer have a pulse.

26 November 2019

Aboshehab updated:

  • Adjusted weapon description for a variety of firearms. Namely adding brand name, designer and fluff details reflected off the sprite and mechanical capability.

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed some exosuits not spawning with the right gear.

Arrow768 updated:

  • No longer autospawns antagonists during gamemodes with autospawn enabled after a evac or transfer shuttle has been called.
  • Maint access has been tweaked to only allow engineers and heads of staff global access to maint.

Ferner updated:

  • The Republic of Biesel flags are now available in the loadout too.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Added surgery goggles to the surgery ORs.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Echoes no longer have the mass warp ability.

25 November 2019

Geeves updated:

  • Standard Cardox grenades now produce a gas explosion, instead of foaming like a cleaner grenade.
  • Cardox now properly gets rids of K'ois and K'ois plants.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Several backend changes regarding human processing.
  • Your heart now handles your blood! If you have no heart, well... you're not gonna bleed, but you're gonna die fast.
  • Fixed a few runtimes.
  • Fixed a few issues with arterial bleeding.
  • Some pain messages have been tweaked.
  • You should now lose more or less blood depending on your pulse.
  • Losing your lungs and your heart is now more severe. Don't lose either one or you'll have a really hard time living.
  • Removed advanced operating tables. They didn't work.

Sue, Alberyk, Datamatt updated:

  • Modular mechs. They are very different than our old mechs, so expect fun things.
  • All old mechs (including tanks) and their equipment were removed.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Fixes some PDA grammar.
  • You can now switch from writing in cursive to writing normally when using a fountain pen.

24 November 2019

Geeves updated:

  • Fixes added Z-Level grab stuff.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Fixes some invisible bowman onmob sprites.
  • Fixes medical bedsheets back sprite using a blue cross instead of green.

23 November 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed some issues related to the pra space ruin.

Brainos, Ferner, Geeves, Kyres1, Poze, Sleepywolfe updated:

  • Re-mapped the Tau Ceti Foreign Legion base and gave them a few new gizmos and doodads plus the now fixed droppods by Poze, further tweaked by Ferner.
  • Re-mapped some parts of the surface and bridge surface.
  • Rebranded the TCFL Commander to Legate, added some new threads(tweaked by Brainos) for them. Added the TCFL Sentinels, whose mission is to protect BLV The Tower. Summoned via ghostspawner. Added the dropship pilot role.
  • Added the blaster revolver, code and sound provided by Geeves.
  • Added Biesel flag/banner + blaster turret sprites by Kyres1.
  • Added a couple TCFL related posters by Sleepywolfe.
  • Made the telebaton more visible when equipped and no longer just a copy of the nullrod.
  • A bunch of misc mapping bugfixes in places. Tweaked the blaster rifle so accuracy was improved properly when wielded.

Chada-1 updated:

  • Recolored and added lots of Landmate and Treadmate 'borg sprites, cleaned up the names some.
  • Recolored some basic 'borg sprites.

Geeves updated:

  • There is now a visible message when people go up and down levels.
  • You can now lift people up Z-levels if you have a red grab or higher on them.
  • You can now prevent people from falling down Z-levels if you're within 1 tile of them, and have a blue grab or higher on them.

MattAtlas, Wezzy updated:

  • Resprited and renamed the internals box you spawn with. Thank you Wezzy for the sprite.
  • Added a flare to the emergency survival box.

MoondancerPony updated:

  • Actually fixes the runtime with syringes this time.
  • Telescience portals now output things on their tile. This fixes a number of bugs.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Adds new radio headset sprites, to match the PDAs.
  • New Bowman headsets! Functionally identical, looks swankier. Can be found in any department locker.

Wowzewow (Wezzy), SierraKomodo updated:

  • Swallowing pills now displays a message to people within a 2 tile radius. This message does not tell them what pill you swallowed.
  • Initiating a give (Right click > Give) now displays a message that you 'hold out an item' to the target.

22 November 2019

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fixed IPCs having no brain, or more accurately, not using it properly. To live.
  • Fix atmos tech utility belt tool overflow on spawn.

MattAtlas updated:

  • IPCs no longer die upon spawning.
  • Fixed cloning instantly killing people.

SynysterSparx updated:

  • Changeling arm can now be used to attack robots. Still able to open robot maintenance hatch and other crowbar things with it if in help mode.

21 November 2019

Alberyk, Kyres1 updated:

  • Added a new ghost role for one of the away sites.
  • Species related ert and ghost roles should now get their relevant languages.

Geeves updated:

  • Moved tongue flicking from the IC tab to the abilities tab.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Internal bleeding has been removed.
  • It has been replaced with the much more impactful arterial bleeding. They will cause blood squirts in random directions. This is healed via fixovein in surgery or bicaridine overdose. Bandages will stave off some of the bleeding.
  • Cutting people's throats now cuts their cartoid artery as well.
  • Added tendon cutting. This will make your limb unusable and is applied on random chance based on damage when someone is damaged. Repaired with fixovein in surgery.
  • You can now click a human's limb to apply pressure on its wounds. This will reduce bleeding.

SynysterSparx updated:

  • Cultist stun runes no longer stun nearby cultists.
  • Mute victims of cultist stun rune.
  • Extend cultist stun rune stun time to 3.

Wowzewow(Wezzy) updated:

  • Expired Halloween candy has been removed from snack machines.
  • The archaic lollipop and gumball machines have been removed.
  • Courtesy of Getmore Corporation, enjoy Carps Ahoy, Tuna snax, Ad-mints, Chewy Fruit gum, and lollipops in your nearest vending machine instead!
  • Lollipops and gum come in wrappers now, due to hygenie concerns.
  • PDA sprites are on lightmode again.
  • You can now put pen-shaped things into the PDA pen slot.
  • New fountain pens! Write like a 19th century person writing a letter like some kind of space hipster!
  • PDAs now have color coded pens to go with them as well. Some even have fountain pens!
  • Pen insertion and removal have new sounds.

20 November 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Space cleaner should no longer deal toxin damage when sprayed on people.

Alberyk, Kyres1 updated:

  • Reworked the changeling lesser form power. It transform the changeling into a small monster, that can ventcrawl and fun fast.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Internal organs will now self-heal below 2 points of damage. Be careful - this doesn't work if you have toxins in your body.
  • Open and retracted incisions will now show damaged organs and broken bones. Spooky!

19 November 2019

Aboshehab updated:

  • Replaces all instances of 'phisical' to 'physical. This includes rebuilding the vueui

Alberyk updated:

  • Reduced the amount of holsters that spawns in the head of security and detective's closet"
  • The Pesti-Shock gun now fits inside the janibelt.

Furrycactus updated:

  • Added two more Emergency Shield Projectors to Engineering Hard Storage, added four to Atmospherics, and two in the shield control room.
  • Reduced the power draw of Emergency Shield Projectors to more reasonable levels, so two don't max out an entire substation.

Geeves updated:

  • Added a new holodeck variant, Dining Hall.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fixed an issue where dirtied or broken microwaves would fail to start again, even when cleaned or fixed.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Fixes some accidental sprite changes.
  • Fixes nullorb sprite..

17 November 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Telescience accidents can not create bluespace echos anymore.

Arrow768 updated:

  • Fixed nullrod being invisible.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • IPCs can no longer eat crayons.

Ferner updated:

  • Added the rest of the hivebot beacon types to the gold slime extract blacklist.

Geeves updated:

  • You can now choose whether baby carp hide your hair when they're on your head.
  • Antagonist roles are now restricted by player account (on Aurora) age.
  • Reassembling a null item now correctly assigns new values to it.
  • You can no longer bonk yourself in the head when blessing people, if you're perfectly sane.
  • Chance to prompt the convert path raised to 75% up from 33%. (Cultists should not mess around with chaplains.)
  • Damage done by conversions reduced a tad.
  • Chance of null rod waving curing some mental traumas raised by 10%.
  • You can no longer accidentally bash the shit out of people with the null rod.
  • Tapping your rod against the floor now makes a visible message, and reveals runes in a wider radius.
  • Bibles now have better descriptors, meme sprites removed.
  • Added new bible types, as well as a generic variant with no face.
  • You can now only bless up to 60u of water, the amount that's in a flask. No more blessing water tanks.
  • Adds craftable burial urns.
  • Added null orb sprite.
  • Added the Catholic Rosary to the Bible and White Bible spawns.

MattAtlas updated:

  • You should no longer randomly spawn without one of your loadout items.
  • You can now actually delete warrants.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Adds the Scarab religion to chargen. Humans only right now.

Wowzewow updated:

  • Resprites bedsheets and beds.
  • Adds more functionality to bedsheets. Click to roll them and unroll them to tuck yourself in, Alt-Click to fold them, Drag and Drop onto yourself to pick them up, and you can equip it in your backpack slot to wear it as a cape. Stab a screwdriver in it to make a spooky ghost costume!

16 November 2019

Ferner updated:

  • Service grippers can now pick up cutlery.
  • Xenobotanists now spawn with the right access again.

Geeves updated:

  • Lighters now have a different colour when on. Welders now produce light.

Wowzewow(Wezzy) updated:

  • Fixes hardhat light helmet alignment.

15 November 2019

BRAINOS updated:

  • Slightly updated the military jackets.

Geeves, Kyres1 updated:

  • A new mascot has been introduced to Engineering, Ginny, the baby space carp.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fixed alternate utility belt not starting with tools when selected from loadout.
  • Alternate utility belt is now free to select. Engineering Apprentices can elect to spawn with one, but it will be empty.
  • Job outfits now fill utility belts using belt_contents rather than simply spawning sub-types of utility belt.
  • Microwaves have been reworked from the ground up on the back-end. Microwaves have been moved to a process-based system for cooking, and behave more similarly to other cooking devices.
  • Microwaves have had their UI rebuilt from scratch in Vue.
  • You can now eject individual ingredients and reagents from a microwave. To perform the latter, you must be holding a reagent container with enough space in your hands.
  • You can now start microwaves by alt-clicking on them.
  • Microwaves can now be upgraded, with matter bins, capacitors, and the micro laser affecting maximum cookable items, power usage, and cook time respectively.
  • Microwaves now display their cook time as a progress bar in the UI. Cook time has been reduced across the board.
  • Eject verb for microwaves removed. All interfacing should now be done via the UI.
  • Bugs both known and unknown relating to the old UI and general instability of the microwave have been solved, including food duplication.
  • Vue UI progress bar element now caps width at 100%.
  • Fixed the loadout fixes spewing tools into engineers' backpacks.

14 November 2019

Geeves updated:

  • Unathi can flick their tongues to get a gas reading of the room.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Skrell eyes are now actually black instead of a dark blue.
  • Realigns one of the headtail jewelries.

Wowzewow updated:

  • Fixes Jack O' Lanterns. Carve a pumpkin, shove a candle in it and light it with a lighter.
  • New pumpkin, carved pumpkin, jack o' lantern and candle sprites.

Wowzewow(Wezzy) updated:

  • Xenoarcheology depth scanner no longer invisible, with new sprite to boot!
  • Clicking on posters with help-intent no longer rips it off the wall like a neanderthal, but instead examines it.
  • Tweaks some Christmas and device sprites.

13 November 2019

Alberyk, BRAINOS updated:

  • Added a new meat steak sprite.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Adds a sound effect to decompiler when used on a mob, and enables it to decompile slightly larger pests.

Ferner updated:

  • Tweaked the range and heightened the dropoff of some sounds, particularly gunfire. Emitters are also audible through walls again.
  • Xenobotanists will now spawn with the correct uniform.
  • Fixed an issue with single slot ghost spawners being disabled preemptively. Made the Kataphracts truly unathi exclusive.

Geeves updated:

  • You can now crawl under a lot more circumstances, if you click drag yourself while laying down.
  • Robotics updates:
  • The phoron generator is now safe to use, it does not pollute the environment.
  • More mechfab things have been split into catagories that make sense. Tech level required for some things have been reduced.
  • Robotics can now print robotic internal organs to replace organic organs.
  • Vampires can now choose whether they want their victims to remember the sucking, or forget and be paralyzed.
  • A new vampire ability has been added, "Touch of Life", which gives the target beneficial chemicals.
  • Coming down from frenzy will not call xenos human anymore.

12 November 2019

BRAINOS updated:

  • Fixed a small issue with designer jeans covering hands.

Geeves updated:

  • Lowers fireaxe after-click cooldown to 1.2 seconds down from 2.0.
  • Allows more suits to wear the fireaxe in the suit slot.
  • Raised the temperature resistance of the CE hardsuit.
  • Research now starts at level 3 with most station techs (Not illegal or arcane!).

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Stuttering no longer breaks markup tags (bold, italics, etc.).
  • Stutter procs merged and refactored; stuttering now properly draws off of the strength of the applied stuttering effect to the affected mob.
  • Stuttering now takes the form of first-phoneme repetition, stammering, word repetition, and sound elongation, as opposed to simple letter duplication.

Wowzewow updated:

  • New sprites for improvised swords, Pesti-shocks, Power drills, and Koko bars.
  • Fixes Koko related grammar.

11 November 2019

Furrycactus updated:

  • Moved Telecomms further south, just across from the surface Cargo Bay. Supermatter delaminations might clip the edge of the Fore Solar Array, but otherwise shouldn't entirely decimate Telecomms anymore.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fixed a bug where certain antags would spawn with backpacks when they shouldn't, or fail to spawn with their correct back gear.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Backpack preferences properly spawn now.

10 November 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Tweaked emergency response teams species selections to better reflect lore restrictions.

Alberyk, BRAINOS updated:

  • Added new jackets and pants options to the loadout.
  • Changed the bomber jacket sprite.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fix certain antags not spawning with their chosen backpack preference.

MattAtlas updated:

  • You can now change your skin preset in the nanoUI selector, like when you spawn as a mercenary or raider.

MoondancerPony updated:

  • Fixes a runtime making syringe lung reinflation not work properly on other people.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Adds a fourth Cargo Technician slot.

09 November 2019

DanseMacabre updated:

  • Replaced the sprite of the detective's jacket with an alternative version.

Geeves updated:

  • --CHANGELING CHANGES--
  • Improved sting descriptions.
  • Fixed various typos, made some descriptions more clear.
  • Stealthsuck now does toxins instead of genetic damage (randomly between 10 and 15).
  • Hallucination sting occur 5 - 15 after stinging.
  • Hallucinations last a smaller amount of time.
  • Epinephrine sacs renamed to Adrenaline Sacs.
  • Adrenaline Sacs cost 30 chemicals (was 45) previously.
  • Adrenaline Sacs produce low amounts of oxycodone and hyperzine on activation.
  • Faster chemical regeneration upgrade now regenerates 2.5 times faster (up from 2).
  • Enhanced chemical storage now stores 50 extra (up from 25).
  • Armblades now cost 4 genomes (up from 2).
  • Rapid regeneration now heals genetic damage as well.
  • Regenerative stasis now allows you to revive after 10 seconds (from randomly: between 8 and 20 seconds).
  • Adds a text prompt confirmation if you want to go horrorform or not. Die misclicks, die.
  • Adds a prompt to let ling know they need to wait a minute before they can stealthsucc again.
  • Ling shield does more bashing damage.
  • Harm intent clicking on a powered down and bolted airlock with a hammer or fireaxe will now attack it instead of giving the bolt message.
  • Stun talismans no longer floor, only mute and flash. Note, stun runes unaffected.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fix raiders/heisters not spawning with editable agent IDs.
  • Fix the Einstein Engines ID not showing up, for real this time.

JohnWildkins, Wowzewow, AmoryBlaine updated:

  • Fixed wallets and lanyards, mining carts, the Einstein Engines ID, pAI cards, and the improvised sword having missing sprites.
  • Darker outlines and color tweaks to engineering / cargo outfits, ore + sheet snatchers, the atmos fire helmet, hardhats, and safety goggles.

MattAtlas updated:

  • You can no longer knock someone out with a melee weapon while aiming for the head if they have a helmet on.

PoZe, MattAtlas updated:

  • New human sprites! Your characters will be grey until you select a preset. Please send all feedback regarding human colors to MattAtlas#6970. This is brought to you mainly by PoZe, who did most of the work.

08 November 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • You can now call the shuttle as the AI once more
  • You can pick up taped papers again.
  • Tweaked golden and silver slimes reactions to be more sane and exclude undesirable results.
  • Fixed certains being able to be lobotomized when they should not.

Alberyk, Kyres1 updated:

  • Added the hakhma as one of the animals that you can find in cargo random crates.

Ferner updated:

  • The laptop vendor can now be unanchored.

Furrycactus updated:

  • Removed the NT breacher chassis control module from the general EVA storage, it's now in the vault. It's a combat hardsuit, it shouldn't be available to any crewmember with EVA access.
  • Moves the Tesla Bay more northward to make it a bit less effected by Supermatter delaminations.
  • Revamps the sublevel breakroom somewhat to incentivise its use a little more. Foyer is largely untouched, save for moving the box of donk pockets.
  • Adds a substation to Engineering's sublevel.
  • Puts the Tesla Coils and Tesla Ball Generator in their proper positions at roundstart to exponentially cut down on start-up time. Hauling literally everything took forever. Now you only need to haul the grounding rods.
  • Changed the colour of the Tesla output wires to blue instead of red. Pretty colours + differentiating it from the main grid.
  • Makes the Tesla Bay APC a supercap critical APC, like the Supermatter engine room, and like the Gravity Generator, instead of the basic one with a shitty 5000 cap 'heavy-duty' cell.
  • Un-fucks the Engineering Storage area designation. Engineering EVA Storage and Hard Storage no longer share the exact same area designation, both with their own APCs for some reason. They're split into their own respective areas, and Sublevel storage has its own area now too.
  • Gives the Robotics Lab a highcap APC, instead of a 5000 'heavy-duty' cell, because they really need it.
  • Splits the entire 'Robotics Lab' area into 'Robotics Lab', 'Robotics Charging Bay', and 'Cyborgification Bay'. This means three APCs for different objects to draw from, rather than having a cell charger, four exosuit chargers, two borg chargers, and the rest of the robotics equipment being on a single APC with a 5000 cap cell inside it.
  • Renames the 'emergency singularity beacon' in Engineering Hard Storage to 'emergency tesla beacon', for clarity, and because we don't use a Singularity on the Aurora.

Geeves updated:

  • Adds the Kataphracts as an ERT team. A five-man squad of honourbound unathi intent on protecting and assisting the innocent.
  • Energy blades no longer get anchored when activated. You can now pick them up whenever.
  • The energy cutlass can now be stowed in a belt.
  • Added a drill dropper item. It drops drills. Can't be used near station areas, unless tampered with.
  • Added the drill dropper to the QM locker, to be distributed to trusted miners.
  • Ninja now needs 15 players playing before it gets chosen as a gamemode.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Traps have been overhauled on the back-end, and their interactions simplified to the end-user.
  • Large traps must now be anchored and then set before use. The process takes three seconds with a wrench and five seconds with an open hand respectively. Large traps can only deploy once anchored.
  • You can place someone/thing into a large trap (via buckling) regardless of the trap's deployment.
  • You can once again anchor large traps to the floor with a wrench.
  • Fixed certain parts of the trap capture event not firing depending on the method of capture.
  • You can no longer teleport inside of traps by attempting to sneak through them from a long distance away.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Wulumunusha no longer silences you for a crazy amount of time. Is druggy for a bit longer at max.
  • Circuits now produce light again. My mistake.

Wowzewow updated:

  • New sprites for PDAs, IDs, and PDA cartridges.
  • PDA inserting and ejecting stuff should make the correct sounds now.

06 November 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Replace in game references about rig with hardsuit, to make things more consistent.

Arrow768 updated:

  • Construction Drones can no longer go to the Aurora.
  • Mining Drones can no longer go to the Derelict.
  • TSC is now restricted to station levels instead of player levels.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Card holders now hold cards like they should. Children's card game elitists, rejoice!

JohnWildkins updated:

  • ERTs should no longer stop the emergency shuttle from being called.

MoondancerPony updated:

  • Mindslaves are no longer lobotomised; they're more like vampire thralls.
  • Extends the cleric resurrection time limit to 30 minutes instead of 5.

05 November 2019

Ferner updated:

  • Turned off ambient occlusion for shuttle turfs.

04 November 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Robotic simple animals are now damaged by emp.
  • NanoTrasen should not longer deploy deathsquads by accident when using a distress beacon.
  • Fixed wizards not being able to use their artifacts.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Added crayon dust to crayons! You can now place crayons in grinders to get dust. Using or eating a crayon will reduce the amount of dust it gives.
  • Added unique flavor descriptions to each color of crayon dust. Sol Marines rejoice!
  • The biogenerator is now able to produce boxes of crayons.
  • Regular crayons now effectively have 20 uses, down from 30. Mime and Rainbow crayons are no longer infinite, but last longer than normal crayons (and give more crayon dust!)

Ferner updated:

  • Fixed an issue with hivebot bombers that could lead to infinite recursion.
  • Stopped the supposedly over a century old shire paint kit from appearing in the mining vendor.
  • Walls and floors of shuttles are no longer indestructible.
  • Added smooth dark shuttle wall icons and some additional shuttle floor varieties by AmoryBlaine.
  • Deleted the depreceated shuttle turfs and their subtypes.

Geeves updated:

  • Adds the ability to cut door bolts.
  • Adds more examine details to airlocks. (Has maglock, door bolt cover busted, door bolts gone?)

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Gives IPCs the ability to speak Sol Common.

03 November 2019

Geeves updated:

  • Reverts the sec antag chances changes, gamemodes should be normal again now.
  • The supermatter manual has now been updated to include accurate and up to date information that will allow you to set the engine up no problem.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • All off-station antags / those with extensive spawned loadouts now use the outfit datum system.
  • ERT/Ghost roles should now have a clearer message as to your particular role and objective.
  • NT Asset Protection and Syndicate Commandos (aka 'Deathsquads') have been moved and re-tooled as ghost spawner ERTs. They will only appear upon admin intervention.
  • Outfit datums should now take backpack choice into account, if options are provided.

02 November 2019

AmoryBlaine, JohnWildkins updated:

  • Added an engineering apprentice uniform, and overalls accessories to the miner, atmos tech, chief engineer and engineer lockers, as well as loadouts. They are equivalent to webbing vests.
  • Atmos tech lockers now start with blue hazard vests, and the wardrobe locker includes matching (non fire-safe) hard hats.
  • Added safety goggles with a new sprite with a verb to raise/lower them. The original goggles can be found as 'safety glasses'. Both are available under eyewear in the loadout tab.
  • Updated sprites for the engineer, CE, atmos tech, janitor, CT (incl. an alt uniform in lockers and loadout), quartermaster, and miner jumpsuits. Updated atmos fire suit sprite.
  • New utility belt (incl. alt sprite available in loadout), hard hat, engineering beret, sheet and ore snatcher, and hydrogen ore sprites.
  • New hazard vest sprites. Hazard vests can now be zipped up or left loose with an appropriate verb.
  • New atmos airlock sprites, new mining, atmos, and janitorial locker sprites.

BurgerBB updated:

  • Removed all instances of guaranteed contraband spawn in maintenance.
  • Added additional maintenance loot spawns.

Geeves updated:

  • Improved sword parry sounds.
  • Robotics can no longer fabricate knock-off stealth RIGs.
  • You can now use magboots to maintain your balance during shuttle transit.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • With the gripper, hitting the drop hotkey (Q) now drops the held item. If there is no held item, the gripper is put away as normal.
  • The scientific gripper can now hold slime steroids.
  • The chemistry gripper can now hold paper. This is mostly to assist medical borgs handling scans and the like.
  • Modules relying on cyborg synthesizers (nanopaste, ATKs, etc.) now cannot be used once the synthesizer is depleted.
  • Injecting a monkey cube in a cyborg gripper no longer places the monkey inside the gripper's pocket dimension.
  • Service cyborgs can no longer open a plane to infinite grass tiles via their service gripper.
  • Cyborgs can now re-lock secure crates.
  • Clerical cyborgs can now browse paper bundles and pick up duct-taped paper with their gripper.
  • The cyborg module inventory now correctly updates when using the drop hotkey (Q, default) to put away a module.
  • Sec. cadet hazard vests can now be properly zipped/unzipped.
  • Safety goggles can now be properly adjusted.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Removed fullblock chance in normal circumstances. This means you shouldn't ever have your armor absorb bullets completely unless your armor is much stronger than the bullet you're receiving.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Wulumunusha vine seeds are now in the various seed vendors.
  • The bar/kitchen now get banana juice cartridges in the dispensers.
  • Slightly more Dyn seeds in vendors.

ParadoxSpace & AmoryBlaine updated:

  • Adds a helmet and a chest-rig for Paramedics and EMTs. Sprites by the ever-loving AmoryBlaine.
  • Physician lockers now contain HUDpatches.
  • Chest-rigs and Paramedic jackets can now hold blood bags.

01 November 2019

Ferner updated:

  • Gave the freelance mercs a headset, switched their id to an agent one, and fixed the leader's rifle being the wrong type.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fixed an exploit relating to the anti-spam filter.

31 October 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • High heels now have a minor slowdown, but are a bit more robust in combat.

Geeves updated:

  • Janitorial staff are now equipped with an Arodentia gun, capable of keeping any well-meaning establishment clear of pests.
  • Janitorial staff now have an armpit holster to keep their Arodentia gun in.
  • Arodentia guns have come out of the experimental phase, now featuring new abilities.
  • Rats now have their health reduced to reasonable levels.

ParadoxSpace & MoondancerPony updated:

  • Circuit lights no longer have UV.

30 October 2019

BurgerBB updated:

  • The station's meteor shield room is no longer connect to the main grid.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Adds over twenty-five tea drinks and recipes, for both iced teas and hot teas. Cider, too! Baristas and hipsters rejoice!
  • Adds three alcoholic drinks to accompany the tea and cider. One ethanol-based, one butanol-based, one toothpaste-based (Eugh).
  • Adds tea, green tea, chai tea, and hot cider to the Coffee Master 3000. They are also available at the hot drinks vendors.
  • Adds two cans each of hakhma milk and fermented fatshouter milk to the booze-o-mat to help the bartender mix more drinks.
  • Adds around twenty new sprites for many of the new drinks.
  • Fixes several typos found in latte descriptions.
  • Adjusts the reagent color of Iced Tea from its weird blue to a color closer to its sprite.
  • Due to budget cuts, tea from the hot drinks vendor now comes in disposable cups.
  • Fixes pumpkin spice lattes from the hot drinks vendor being vended with regular coffee mixed in it.

29 October 2019

Ferner updated:

  • Fixed an issue with the freelancer merc shuttle that lead to occupants being pulled south.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Pumps can now be unsecured by pipe wrenches.

28 October 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Headgear should be a bit less restricting when stopping things from being equipped on the ear slot.
  • Fixed renaming food having no character limit.
  • Nutriment should be less effective in recovering blood.

BurgerBB updated:

  • Removed, added, and reworked maintenance loot items.

Geeves updated:

  • You can no longer retaliate against disarm attempts with an in-hand grab.

27 October 2019

BurgerBB updated:

  • Added a new config setting that subtracts z-level transfer explosion power.

Geeves updated:

  • Donk Pockets can now be heated properly in a microwave, they gain additional nutriment, animal protein and healing juice.
  • Sin-Pockets now heat properly when used in hand, heats instantly, and gives slightly more hyperzine and synaptizine than before.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Earmuffs and other equipment that covers both ears no longer duplicate infinite instances of themselves when click+dragged out of their slot.
  • Helmets and other equipment that cover the head now prevent ear equipment from being equipped or unequipped.
  • Seismic charges now correctly have their overlay removed from the object they're placed on when detonated.
  • You can no longer queue up simultaneous limb-breaks while aggressively grabbing someone.
  • Using credit chips at the laptop vendor now correctly updates the credit chips' sprite and examined value.
  • Attempting to equip a wielded gun with the equip hotkey (def: E) no longer spams the chat log with error messages.

Lady Fowl updated:

  • Therapy pods no longer spit components out.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Distress Beacons are here! They replace the standard ERT call with a cool sound effect.
  • Activating a distress beacon is the same as always. Once activated, a random ERT will be selected between, for now, independent neutral mercenaries, TCFL and Nanotrasen ERT.
  • Added a cool new ERT base for outsider ERTs to the centcomm level, courtesy of Fernerr.
  • Removed the Join Response Team verb. All ERTs are now ghost spawners.
  • Merc leaders can now actually use the hardsuit.
  • Merc leaders no longer spawn with items they shouldn't have.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Skrell glowing algae actually glows now.

synystersparx updated:

  • Fixed cultist teleport rune. Now uses proper user selected third word.
  • Cultist hide rune can now be imbued into a talisman.
  • Improved prevention of multiple cultist runes on same location.
  • Cultist reveal talisman now works properly.

26 October 2019

Ferner updated:

  • Tweaked the hivebot spawnrate and spawn pattern.
  • Fixed some miscellaneous bugs related to hivebots and added the beacons to the gold slime core blacklist.

Geeves updated:

  • You can now build improvised swords. The hilt determines the integrity thereof, while the blade determines the damage it does.
  • Disarming now takes a portion of your stamina. You cannot disarm if your stamina is near-empty.
  • Disarming someone with a weapon in their hand has a chance for them to retaliate by bashing you with it.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Hephaestus atmospheric technicians should now spawn with the proper uniform and ID.
  • Add the ability for ore redemption consoles to print yield declaration reports, with a valid inserted ID and prior processed ores.
  • (Essentially) all instances of istype checks for tools removed. As such, combitools and impact wrenches should now work for all normal tool uses except mech and RIG crafting.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Suit slot items can now support armband and decor slot accessories.
  • You can now have multiple armbands.
  • Shoulder patches are now flippable.

PoZe updated:

  • Tesla no longer melts ashes, emitter beams, its own energy balls and accelerated particles.
  • Tesla now properly consumes accelerated particles.

otatoh updated:

  • Adds a *chitter emote for Vaurca.

25 October 2019

BurgerBB updated:

  • Sorted the maintenance loot list in code.
  • Tweaked nearly all vending machines to have their own contraband and premium items.
  • Nutrition and hydration loss from low blood reduced from 7 and 3 to 2 and 1.

Furrycactus updated:

  • Gave the Supply Department (Cargo + Mining) their own substation, added a new one behind the Bar for the rest of Service and the public halls. Now you can crank the power way up for mining without potentially frying everyone else.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • All closed drink containers remain shakeable, but now only carbonated drinks should explode when shook.
  • Added a tag to track carbonated reagents.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Neural suppressors actually work now.
  • Hulks no longer auto-add a period after their exclamation marks.

MoondancerPony updated:

  • Vaurca no longer exhale leftover phoron from their breath into the air. They also now breathe 1/6 the volume of air at 6x (100%) efficiency, meaning that all the phoron they breathe is converted to CO2.
  • Thoracostomies now work properly.
  • Stops Vaurca from blowing their lungs up by breathing from their tank. Sorry, Voa.

PoZe updated:

  • Animal traps no longer can have more than one prey at a time.
  • Traps now properly trap prey when it is thrown at them.
  • Deconstructing trap with prey inside no longer makes prey anchored to the turf.
  • You cannot buckle a person into a trap.
  • You can no longer deconstruct trap with welder off.
  • Passing throuh trap no longer traps you if it is full.

SynysterSparx updated:

  • Fixed typos in the cultist tome.

23 October 2019

Geeves updated:

  • Changes the entertainment and medical radio colours to be more distinct.
  • Made dosay and devsay more readable. Stop ignoring me, admins, PLEASE, PLEEEEEEEEEEEAAA-
  • Gnome still not found. Search parties are getting antsy.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • All pages of the clipboard are now writable.
  • You can now write to a clipboard with an attached pen, without needing to remove it. If a clipboard is empty, you can also attach a pen by clicking on the clipboard with a pen in your active hand.
  • Clipboard UI now updates when papers or a pen is added to the clipboard.
  • Clipboard icon now updates when the front page is written on.

Karolis2011 updated:

  • Made new player panel gap consistent.

PoZe updated:

  • Tesla no longer gains energy from just colliding with objects.
  • Fixes sprite for singularity beacon not showing up.
  • Tesla no longer spams admin longs when a new ball is created outside of containment.
  • Telsa looses energy when dropping ball which should be slightly below how much is required for new ball.
  • Tesla dissipation rate has been buffed, it now looses energy faster.
  • Tesla dissipates every time it zaps something.
  • Tesla now melts any object or mob(but not turfs) it touches or when it zaps it while sacrificing a miniball.
  • Added special emergency singularity beacon that is to be used when Singulo/Telsa are on the Loose. When Tesla zaps the beacon, it will discharge all energy into it, dying and destroying beacon.

22 October 2019

Fire and Glory updated:

  • New Vox sprites for bulletproof vests and riot armor.

Lady Fowl updated:

  • Ports chewing gum and chew.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Added a neural suppressor to surgery operating tables. Putting people on them and clicking the table will activate it, making them fall asleep. No need for anesthetic..

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Fixes the 'circles' glowing algae for Skrell being slightly crooked.

PoZe updated:

  • Enabled Empty Contents verb in Object tab for Bags. Bags have base delay of 0.5 second per item to empty and special bags like Captain, Wizard, Synie, Engineering have 0.8 second delay per item.

21 October 2019

Ferner updated:

  • Fixed mech sounds and some other sounds becoming horribly garbled when played.
  • Gunshots and flashbangs can now be heard farther and through walls again.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Microwave, oven, deep fryer, cereal maker, and candy maker circuit boards added.
  • You can now upgrade and deconstruct/reconstruct microwaves and other cooking appliances. Note: advanced parts currently do not affect microwaves, and deconstructing a microwave yields no parts. This will be fixed in the overhaul.
  • Oven efficiency now starts at 70% and grows slower to 100%.
  • Oven heat loss due to door open cut down massively, to 1.5x heating from 4x.
  • Deconstructing a machine now returns cable coil. Wirecutting a blueprint on the cable-coil stage lowers it to the 'secured blueprint' stage, and as such now requires a wrench to remove.
  • Printing a smart-fridge board no longer gives you an operating table circuit board.
  • Deconstructing a machine no longer displays the incorrect icon state.
  • Candy and cereal makers no longer fail to cook.
  • Cent. Com. intercepts are no longer omniscient, and will no longer recommend rehabilitation for mercenaries and other off-station antagonists at round start.

20 October 2019

Ferner updated:

  • Fixed mechs sometimes teleporting up two levels instead of one when walking up stairs.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • The destination tagger now properly routes to the CMO's office.
  • The mail room is no longer missing emergency shutters.
  • Voidsuits now have an action button to deploy or retract their helmet.

Lady Fowl updated:

  • Add's KoKo bars, a unathi themed candy.

Skull132 updated:

  • Added a station procedures book into the security lobby library.
  • Resprited the corporate regulation book.

19 October 2019

Ferner updated:

  • Added a handful new hivebot types and changed their spawn behaviour.
  • Tweaked the slime infestation event to be a bit more colorful.
  • Made it so infestation events should no longer trigger outside the station, inside xenobiology cells and some other misc. areas.
  • Fixed the prison break event from not working entirely correctly with virology, added a chance for it to happen at the bridge.
  • Fixed some announcements missing their custom titles. Particularly those used by random events. Tweaked their font and size as well.

Furrycactus, AmoryBlaine updated:

  • Added the rest of the new MedSci uniform sprites by AmoryBlaine.
  • Scientists and Xenobiologists have access to an alternate outfit from the loadout.
  • Added several new coloured labcoats for Medical staff to aid in distinction between roles.
  • Medical has been made green once more.

Geeves updated:

  • Forming armblades and flesh riot shields as ling now break cuffs and straitjackets.
  • Changing into a lesser form now uncuffs you.
  • You can use an armblade is a crowbar, to do crowbar based activities.
  • The armblade can be used to slice and dice through non-reinforced walls and girders.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fixed an issue where borgs could swap the mode of their inflatable dispenser while deploying one, thereby creating an unrecoverable door or wall.
  • Reagent ice now melts at 25 C, allowing drinks requiring it to be made once again.
  • Soda cans (incl. water bottles) can now be filled, and no longer freeze chemistry interfaces when inserted.
  • Custom outputs from cooking appliances (personal pizzas, etc.) should now fit inside storage containers.
  • The oven now pings when a custom output is completed.
  • You can no longer force-feed robots or silicons.
  • Batter can no longer be applied from infinite distance. Lasagna and doner kebab have had their reagents boosted to match their ingredients.
  • AI-intercepted PDA messages now correctly display the recipient or sender.
  • Robotics spray cleaner now starts filled.

aleksix updated:

  • Mask adjustment command now resides in the Object group and is properly capitalized, instead of having a separate category.

18 October 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Diona can now be Zeng-Hu, Idris, Necropolis and Hephaestus contractors.
  • The config option that adds maintenance access to assistants now takes in consideration the visitor alt title.

BurgerBB updated:

  • Explosions from APC machine overloads reduced by 66%.
  • Increased the size of the warning text saying that AI abilities are on steroids compared to other servers.

Geeves updated:

  • You will now vomit into a sink, disposals bin or toilet if you are in range.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fix newscasters not identifying users with their IDs in wallets.

Lady Fowl updated:

  • Adds the ability for clients to set there FPS clientside.

Mwahahahaha updated:

  • Allows arcade sounds to be toggled. Take a look at the ASFX tab!
  • Made accessories like armbands, badges, holsters, medals, stethoscopes, scarves, ribbons, medallions, pins, shoulder capes, bandoliers, contractor cards and patches, as well as ID cards, PDAs and wallets horizontally flippable when worn.
  • Added additional medals and badges, a lanyard, contractor patches, colourable wallets, colourable wallet purses, and some new okayish ID card overlays for in-wallet icons (all except for the medals and most badges are added to the loadout menu; one has been added to arcade prize pool).
  • Added other holsters to HoS and detective lockers.
  • Added holobadges to the loadout list for security roles only (excluding investigative roles).
  • Added the ability to customise loadout item names and descriptions. BE CAREFUL: disabling the item will delete its custom name and description!
  • Added the ability to wear ID cards, wallets (including lanyards), and PDAs over your suit by toggling it.
  • Gave job-restricted loadout items a small descriptor showing what jobs they can be spawned in.
  • Gave the locket an opened sprite.
  • Added ID card on-mob (when it's worn) icon variants for contractor ID cards and reworked the vanilla ones.
  • Made certain accessories have arguably more accurate drop sounds.
  • Made simple drop pouches colourable.
  • You no longer need a jumpsuit to wear things on the ID slot. They will still drop if you take your clothes off.
  • Fixed missing sprites for some medals and missing direction icons for Lucy stethoscope and bandolier.

17 October 2019

Geeves updated:

  • Emergency shields meant to keep hull breaches contained, now prevent air from passing through them.
  • The mecha mounted sleeper now correctly injects reagents into the occupant.
  • Refitted voidsuits now correctly display their in-hand sprites.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Binoculars now correctly zoom out when the user moves.

16 October 2019

Geeves updated:

  • Reinforced walls no longer generate extra rods out of the aether when deconstructed.

15 October 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Ghost roles will now respect alien whitelist restrictions.

Furrycactus updated:

  • Put two hyposprays in the EMT/Paramedic quarters, one in each wall locker. Added three more hyposprays to the sublevel, enough for each MD slot. Stop fighting over them.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Photocopier no longer prints half the correct number of copies.
  • You can no longer infinitely tear-off copies of carbon copies. Carbon copies no longer have the remove-copy verb, either.
  • Copying paper bundles in the photocopier now prints them sequentially and adds them to the bundle.
  • Copying a paper bundle no longer creates a 'ghost' paper linked to the first page of the copied bundle.
  • You can once again write to normal sheets of paper in paper bundles.
  • Cooking appliances requiring pre-heat (ovens, fryers, etc.) now must actually be pre-heated before use.
  • Oven trays will no longer duplicate messages when inserted.
  • Oven/fryer temperature efficiency now correctly plays a role in time-to-cook.
  • Ovens and fryers now draw the correct amount of power, 6 KW and 12 KW respectively.
  • Upgrading an oven or fryer's scanner module will no longer increase time-to-heat.
  • Ovens should now reach minimum operating temperature in approx. 12 minutes, and fryers in around 10. Additionally, they will start at 40% effiency, rather than 0%.
  • Upgrading oven/fryer components is now much more effective.
  • Various minor changes and fixes to appliance behavior, removal of superfluous procs and vars

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Dionae heat resistance has been buffed.
  • Diona chirping emotes are now fixed and not double.

Geeves updated:

  • Removed Black K'ois as a possible K'ois mutation.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fixed being unable to late-join as alt-title jobs if character age below requirement for main title
  • Fixed 'Your character too young!' warning if late-joining as alt-title younger than main

Ferner updated:

  • Old machine frames are now properly deconstructable.

Geeves updated:

Geeves, with some code by BurgerBB updated:

  • Added a ninja frequency to radios which ninjas spawn with to collaborate.
  • Two ninjas now spawn instead of just one.
  • Gave the ninja better spawning gear, a syndicate uniform, a belt with some tools and a pAI card.
  • The ninja suit now has new lights, and its shoes are now magboots.
  • Added a doorhack RIG module. Functions the same as the normal doorhack, but the user can move around after initiating the hack, as well as hack multiple airlocks at once.
  • Gave the ninja teleporter a 5 second cooldown between uses.
  • Added new advanced combat belt, can hold various gear that a ninja would usually come across.
  • Buffed the ninja's RIG armour values slightly. Still requires feedback, if ninjas die too quickly, it will be buffed more.
  • Added an additional toolbox, chair, suitcooling unit and ninja spawn point to the ninja shuttle on the centcomm level.
  • Gave the ninja a new uniform + gloves.
  • EMERGENCY power generator now generates 2500 units of power, with a cooldown of five minutes.
  • Gnomes still evading capture. Report any occurences of gnomes and gnome activity to Aurora authorities.

  • Fixes scientist shoes for real this time.

MattAtlas updated:

16 September 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed scientist shoes having no icon.
  • Fixed kinetic accelerators having firing pins.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Fixes a handful of Necropolis oriented bugs; the research uniform alt and jobs spawning with outfits.

15 September 2019

Geeves updated:

  • Made pAI move a little slower. Should be easier to catch and destroy if they're being annoying.
  • Made pAI doorjacks open bolted airlocks, provided the bolt wire isn't cut.
  • pAI can no longer uncuff people.

ParadoxSpace & AmoryBlaine updated:

  • Adds the alt Necropolis research uniform to the loadout. My bad.
  • Refactors the Necropolis security uniform just a little bit.
  • Fixes being unable to select the alt Zeng-Hu uniform and the Idris service uniform having no sprite, as well as various other small fixes.
  • Fixes Bedhead 5 to properly come up all the way.

14 September 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed the impact wrench having no sprite.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Eridani paramedics now have a special uniform.
  • Zeng-Hu consulars now have a special uniform.
  • Idris service contractors now have a new uniform.
  • Added contractor berets and other gear to the new Factions tab. You can't take these if you don't have the appropriate faction selected.

Alberyk, Kyres1 updated:

  • Added the ballistic gauntlet to the uplink.

Ferner updated:

  • Janitor carts can now be pushed like wheelchairs via Ctrl Click.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Ballistic projectiles are now twice as fast.
  • Ballistic projectiles now have a new sprite.
  • You can no longer wirelessly close lockers.

Alberyk, Jamchop23334 updated:

  • Added tajaran, unathi and skrell zombies.

Ferner updated:

  • Changed the icon states of some mapped in machine blueprints.
  • Moved a light fixture and camera in hydroponics that were blocking the status readouts on a couple of trays.

10 September 2019

Drago updated:

  • Makes a plethora of machines buildable.
  • Add's Pigs and animal breeding.
  • Ports life support system from old code.
  • Ports the impact wrench from TG.
  • Ports jaws of life from TG.
  • Adds the toolspeed and usesound vars.

Goret updated:

  • Death alarm kit removed from medical. People can now die again without anyone hearing about it.

Naelynn updated:

  • Reduced bloat in inventories of some merchants
  • Removed economy breaking tritium/osmium bars
  • Gave ability to buy things from merchant to more traders

09 September 2019

Ferner updated:

  • Fixed trays spilling their contents even when being put down on a table carefully.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Fixed the rat spawner description, added a period to the pointing action.

ben10083 updated:

  • To reduce the number of fatalities and workplace incidents relating to Heads of Security, the HoS shall now be given a helmet and magboots.

08 September 2019

Arrow768 updated:

  • Removes the option to join as random job.

Ferner updated:

  • Increased the storage capacity of medical's sharp disposal boxes and they're also no longer foldable.
  • Added pixel precision when placing most items on tables/racks, like with food/drinks. Ported from Bay.
  • Adjusted the center of mass on some items to make them easier to place down, thrown items now get a randomized pixel placement.
  • Fixed the tcomms on Exodus.

Geeves updated:

  • Throwing items now decloak ninjas.

Goret updated:

  • Surgery holosigns aren't buggy anymore.
  • Added surgery holosigns on both OR doors. Buttons are available inside, next to the sinks.

Karolis2011 updated:

  • Fixed player panel breaking on cult.

Mwahahahaha updated:

  • Added hair tying for shells too.
  • Added the ability to swap the wrist you wear your watch on (you can now wear it on your left wrist).

07 September 2019

Arrow768 updated:

  • Announcemnts (except alert level changes) are only visible on station levels.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Added a surgery tray to medical ORs and robotics. Sprite credit goes to NewOriginalSchwann.
  • You can now extract shrapnel from someone or yourself with a material knife. It's painful, though! Use the extract shrapnel verb in the Object tab, or extract-shrapnel.
  • Clicking on humans with a cable coil will now stitch their bleeding wounds. Only works if said wounds are bleeding and if they're cuts.

PoZe updated:

  • Detached nymphs now sync their languages with gestalt during detaching.

  • Increases the size of the mop bucket by 3x, and makes mop mop faster, like, 1.5x faster.
  • Buffs the janibelt ( You can finally put gloves, rags and radios in them! )

01 September 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Added more tajaran related options to the loadout.
  • Removed siik'tau.

Mwahahahaha updated:

  • Added 108 hairstyles and 12 facial hairstyles for Humans/Shells, 3 hairstyles for Vox, 3 variant hairstyles and 4 variant facial hairstyles for Unathi, 1 facial hairstyle for Tajara, 3 screens for Baseline IPCs; from Polaris, BS12, Para, tg, and including a small few from yours truly.
  • Renamed hairstyles so that they may hopefully be more convenient to find on a hairstyle list -- be sure to check your character setup in case you're bald!
  • Rewrote the hair tugging messages so that they may show up in lower case.
  • Fixed hair name values and lengths so that they may appear on the Character Setup and Hair Tie lists, with 6 hairstyles being readded.
  • For the next gen devs: rearranged the code and icon_states in the sprite_accessories and appropriate hair.dmi files so that they are mostly in alphabetical order and correspond to each other's positions.

16 August 2019

Geeves updated:

  • Livers can withstand slightly more toxin before getting damaged. Vaurca and Vox livers are much more robust, and will not perish when switching masks.

PoZe updated:

  • Changes malf gravity malfunction ability to only work for a specific area in which AI eye is looking at.
  • The gravity malfunction malf ability now counts for people who have magboots on and will not affect them.
  • AI core no longer falls if it is anchored. Meaning it won't get damage from its own malf gravity ability.
  • Updated Malf manual to include new abilities and some old one too.

Skull132 updated:

  • Random staff will no longer see Discord-PMs. Only R_MOD and R_ADMIN staff will.
  • Remote TGS restart command implemented.
  • Remote announce formatting changed to match the real announce.

  • Added a few pod survivor loadouts.

13 August 2019

Arrow768 updated:

  • Changes the gear of some ghost-spawners.
  • Displays the species a player will be spawned in as, when they select a name.
  • Automatically removes the prefix/suffix from the name if someone accidently enters it at a ghost-spawner prompt.

Furrycactus updated:

  • Added several more light switches around the station.
  • Removed security cameras from construction level again.
  • Added a radiation suit locker to the Research department in Telescience.
  • Solar arrays were made more compact so that they're faster to set up and use less cable. Extra cable coil added to the roof solar array.
  • Solar SMES units have a slightly higher input and output capacity at roundstart.

  • Central Commands actually tells you what gun values it wants, not what it compares against.
  • Central Command no longer wants impossible guns.

04 August 2019

  • Added new player panel to make player management easier.

  • Adjusted merchant economy. Traders also start with larger inventory

  • Adjusted inventory of multiple traders (Food, robot, ai, electronics, vox, mining, blob)

VTCobaltblood updated:

  • Tajara are now allowed to be Hephaestus contractors.
  • Zeng-Hu contractors are now allowed to be Roboticists and Xenobiologists. Idris and Hephaestus contractors are now allowed to be Quartermasters. Idris contractors are allowed to be Detectives, and Necropolis ones can be Forensic Technicians.

  • Overhauls response team stats collection.

31 July 2019

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Allows IPCs to be Eridani PMCs. IPCs in question must be owned, not free.

30 July 2019

Lady Fowl updated:

  • Added a prompt to welder bombing, to prevent accidental bombs.

29 July 2019

PoZe updated:

  • Fall damaged was nerfed: from base 60 to base 40. You no longer take remaining damage to the chest if you took limb damage. Priority of limbs damage was also changed, now it is Legs > arms > head.
  • Added new Malf ability to malfunction gravity generator. Ability makes station loose gravity for 3 seconds and push everyone to the groun as if they fell on Z level.

28 July 2019

Geeves updated:

  • Added a class E Kinetic Accelerator to the mining secure lockers.

27 July 2019

Geeves updated:

  • Added a deployable hoist kit and deployable ladder to the mining vendor. 200 points each.
  • Removed cash and lottery tickets from the mining vendor.

Karolis2011 updated:

  • Refactored record code in to record subsystem.
  • Added new record consoles for new record code.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Fixes the cooldown on the Skrell psychic pinging ability. Sorry about that.

ParadoxSpace & MoondancerPony updated:

  • Skrell and Armalis can now ping for living organisms near their location.
  • Vaurca can no longer be affected by telepathy.

26 July 2019

MoondancerPony updated:

  • Makes it so that you can create a makeshift chemistry workstation allowing for crushing, chopping, and heating reagents. You can add an analyser to it to view the temperature of the reagents.
  • Adds a distillery to turn booze into pure(r) ethanol/butanol and a little bit of water.
  • Adds lean, made from cough syrup, sugar, and space-up. Adds krok juice, made from iron and orange juice. Adds several other drugs coded by BurgerBB in a previous closed PR.
  • Adds cough syrup which prevents coughing from viruses (and spreading viruses via coughing) when in your system.
  • Adds recipes for aforementioned drugs, some using cough syrup.
  • Adds the ability to stop wounds from bleeding using rags.
  • Rags can now be cut from cloth sheets using any sharp object.
  • Rags soaked in reagents will transfer 75% of their reagents as touching and 25% in blood.
  • Alcohol gives pain messages if it's in your blood. This only happens if injected or if it goes through wounds.
  • Certain reagents, like any kind of alcohol, space cleaner, sterilizine, honey, and to a very, VERY small extent water, will disinfect wounds when used on rags.
  • Deflated lungs can be treated, in an emergency, by clicking someone with a syringe with the chest targeted and grab intent enabled. Doing so again will damage the lungs and reverse the treatment.
  • An empty keg has been added to maintenance.
  • Mixing bowls can be printed from the autolathe.
  • Spaceacillin has been refactored into several new chemicals. Cough syrup, allergy medicine, antivirals, antibiotics, and paracetamol can do the exact same spaceacillin once could.
  • Antibiotics (thetamycin) are now available for bacterial infections. They have a small chance of causing side effects such as nausea and vomiting.
  • Antivirals (deltamivir) have replaced spaceacillin and do mostly the same thing, save for bacterial wound infections. They have a small chance of causing side effects such as fever, muscle pain, and fatigue.
  • Cough syrup, allergy medication, paracetamol, and medicine cups are now available in NanoMed vendors.
  • Some drinks now heal damage as they did before, though at reduced levels.
  • Paracetamol now reduces fevers.
  • Medical's supplies have been reduced to a less-excessive level, making chemists less redundant.
  • Syringes now begin capped. After use, syringes get dirty and can also transfer viruses between successive uses (on humans); it's recommended to throw them away in the new sharps bins. If they are only used to transfer reagents, they can be used indefinitely. Ported from Virgo.
  • Medical, Virology, and Xenobiology all have sharps bins for disposal of biohazardous glassware.
  • There are now three hyposprays in the Medical sublevel, which are equivalent to syringes prior to this update. They take the same amount of time to inject, and have a capacity of 15 units, but are reusable.
  • Accidentally refactored (almost) all storage items to use the starts_with var instead of overriding fill(). This should make it a lot less complicated to add new storage boxes.
  • Modifies sprites for syringes, done by Geeves.
  • Adds medicine cups to take medicine by mouth in a dignified manner.
  • Changes the glycerol recipe. One unit of triglycerides (can be obtained from meat) and two units of any pure alcohol will produce three units of glycerol and two units of acetone. Sulfuric acid is required as a catalyst.
  • Adds a recipe for glucose. Nutriment can be catalysed into glucose by adding sulfuric acid.
  • Rats and other simplemobs can now only chew empty boxes or boxes with food in them.

PoZe updated:

  • Detached nymph now get all the verbs as regular nymphs.
  • Added new verb to Diona Gestalt that allows to pause any regeneration.

25 July 2019

Arrow768 updated:

  • Fixes miners being unable to spawn with aviator-mesons.
  • Fixes Heph-miners spawning with the wrong id card and jumpsuit.

Skull132 updated:

  • Modified the way the cell charge anomaly works. It no longer uses absurd ranges to charge stuff.
  • ZAS might be a tick slower at kicking objects around for large zones. On the flip side, it shouldn't lag the server as consistently anymore.
  • VV might take a bit to generate the VV screen for large entries.

24 July 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Removed playable xenomorphs.
  • Replaced the IAA job with the Representative job.

Alberyk, Kyres1, AmoryBlaine updated:

  • Replaces a couple of gun sprites that were references to real life guns, with more futuristic versions.
  • Being hit by a bolter projectile will now produce an animation.

Arrow768 updated:

  • Small mobs can now bite into powerwires.
  • Pumps and other atmos machines that contain pumps now interact with small mobs.
  • Airlocks now close on small mobs.

PoZe updated:

  • Price of mining RIG is increased to 1000 points and amount of supply is reduced to 2 for mining vending machine.
  • Diona limb regeneration is now progress based instead of a 10 minute timer. Light contributes low amount to progress, biomass(nutrition) contributes medium amount. Radiation contributes big amount. In comparison Diona will regenerate within 10 minutes with just light and having no biomass stored beforehand. Diona who has decent amount of biomass stored will regenerate within 5 minutes. Consuming food like cow while regenerating will take 2 minutes to regenerate limb. Diona who is in light, has biomass stored and has radiation emitting at it will take 1-1.5 minutes to regenerate limb.
  • Status panel now shows stats for Diona like how much biomass, and energy are stored out of maximum. And regeneration process of a limb.

Scheveningen updated:

  • Fixes an issue with Fade variant hairstyles not appearing correctly in character set-up to be chosen. Thank ya, thank ya very much.

Skull132 updated:

  • All factions now have a unique ID card.
  • Added the independent faction. At the moment, NT still retains access to the Freelance Journalist job, because the job's system is literal ass and I need to wait for another PR before redoing it.
  • Tweaked the faction selection menu. It now links to the wiki and all.
  • Removed faction specific gear, since it's already present in the job system.

23 July 2019

Geeves updated:

  • Raised the chance that a ling's shield will block an attack.

PoZe updated:

  • Added new paper logos for: [logo_nt] - Regular NT logo, [logo_nt_small] - Small size NT logo, [log_zh] - Zeng-Hu, [logo_idris] - Idris, [logo_eridani] - Eridani, [logo_necro] - Necropolis, [logo_hp] - Hephaestus Industries, [logo_be] - Beisel.

21 July 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Disabled ert during revolution rounds.

MattAtlas updated:

  • All wieldable weapons are now wielded via the Wield Firearm verb, or wield-firearm if you have a macro instead of wield-rifle and wield-shotgun. Update your macros!

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Adds a handful of clothing to the Vaurca.
  • The Shaper helmet now has proper body parts covered.

Skull132 updated:

  • Removed the ability to join as any job despite faction restrictions when using the mid-round join menu.

18 July 2019

PoZe updated:

  • Shake camera now works.
  • Diona Gestalt no longer has stump left after it has regenerated lost limb.
  • Diona nymph can now be attacked by any weapons.
  • Detached limb nymph now gets all verbs of regular nymph, and no longer ignores damage.
  • Detached nymph that merges back together now moves inside of Gestalt, thus preventing Gestalt from regenerating another nymph and wasting energy.

17 July 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Removed the standard cyborg module.

Arrow768 updated:

  • Changes the CCIA recorder to persist logs to the database.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Rats now properly splat if killed by a cat/snare.

16 July 2019

Arrow768 updated:

  • Fixes the blob no longer expanding onto asteroid turfs.
  • The blob can now expand through rock.

15 July 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed the Aut'akh drill having no icon sprite.
  • Fixed telescience portals causing limb damage.
  • Fixed adminhealing turning people's eyes black.

Kaedwuff updated:

  • Constructable weapons such as spears and halberds have had their damage multiplier values severely nerfed. Their damage values are now more in line with the rest of the weapons in the game.
  • Gold and uranium is now much softer than they used to be, making it worthless for stabbing, but much heavier and thus strong as the material for a thrown weapon.

PoZe updated:

  • Diona no longer keeps growing nymphs inside past the defined limit.
  • Diona now regenerates full limb like arm + hand, leg + foot. Since they are of one nymph.

Skull132 updated:

  • Deleted the old faction system. As a result, all player factions choices are reset.
  • Added a new faction system, accessible under the Occupation dialog. Factions now affect what jobs you can choose, and what uniforms you spawn with.

14 July 2019

Arrow768 updated:

  • You can no longery defy the laws of physics by climbing up through solid floors with the use of a ladder
  • You will no longer spawn with a backpack if you have "nothing" selected in your loadout.
  • You no longer have to reload your char slot if you spawn in with species restricted gear.

13 July 2019

Arrow768 updated:

  • Removes borg ckeys aswell.

Furrycactus updated:

  • Added the missing lights on the engineering sublevel, and changed some of the ones that always spawn broken.
  • Fixed the missing riot shields from the Armoury.

MoondancerPony updated:

  • Adds a method of randomly spawning lore-related notes.
  • Text files on computers can now have paper formatting.
  • There is limited support for images in some papers, specifically randomly-spawned notes.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • pAIs now have rat and cat sound emotes available.
  • The pAI mouse is now a pAI rat.
  • pAI monkeys can now actually rest.

PoZe updated:

  • Diona Gestalt can now detach limbs into a nymph and use it for scouting or whaterver they want. Detaching makes gestalt loose that specific limb. Both Gestalt and nymph get special ability to switch between bodies while detached. Nymph can merge back into gestalt and replace lost limb right away or if limb already regenerated by itself, it will replenish energy and nutrition spent on detaching nymph.

Skull132 updated:

  • Walls now block sound properly!

12 July 2019

Arrow768 updated:

  • Ghost are no longer able to freely move around on the derelict. They can follow human mobs on the drelict tough.

Ben10083 updated:

  • After some unforseen delays in delivery and manufacturing, a replacement Ian has been stationed on the Aurora.
  • Removed corgi meat from list of Cargo bounties.

PoZe updated:

  • Fixed hostile mobs trajectory check. Allowing them to shoot mechs, shields, mobs, etc.
  • Mechs no longer display message about armour delfecting trajectory test projectiles which have no damage.

11 July 2019

  • Added an appropriate drop sound for basketballs.
  • Changed the drop sound of beach balls to fit better.

10 July 2019

  • Fixed a spot in research maintenance that had the wrongly designated area, which lead to a hole in the ceiling being created on occasion.
