  • Fixes miscalculation in heat reduction for fire extinguishers.

Karolis2011 updated:

  • Added a reliable way to manually force send resources to client if asset manager fails.

05 August 2018

Alberyk updated:

  • Added checkers and chess game kits to the custom loadout.
  • Added some random asteroid dungeons.
  • You can now build floors using some materials, such as silver, gold and diamond.
  • Added tajaran flags and banners to the custom loadout.
  • Added tobacco, peppercorn, onion and garlic seeds.
  • Added new cooking recipes.
  • Using arm blade or shield does not create gibs anymore.
  • Removed shotgun speed loaders.
  • Added unique sprites for shotgun shells boxes.
  • Added some loaded and unloaded sprites for some guns.
  • Sterile masks can now be adjusted, to either cover the face or hang on the neck.
  • Cutting any gloves fingertips will now reduce the insulation of the gloves in question.
  • Added a pair of tajaran and unathi insulated gloves to the chief engineer and electrical supplies closets.
  • Added a new unathi clothing to the loadout.

Arrow768 updated:

  • Centcom now pays for certain products shipped to them. Use the export scanners to determine what they would like to have and how much they pay for it.
  • Sometimes central requests special products to be shipped to them. Make sure to pay attention to the cargo consoles.
  • Invoices for shipments and orders can now be printed using the cargo control console.

BurgerBB updated:

  • Added Monoammonium Phosphate, a reagent that excels in extinguishing fires, and acts as a fertilizer. They are now found in fire extinguishers instead of water. Added Monoammonium Phosphate tanks around the station in place of some water tanks.
  • Added a new weak chem sprayer, 'Xenoblaster', which can be found in xenobiology for xenobiologists.
  • Fire extinguishers can be filled with any reagent using an extinguisher cartridge. Extinguisher cartridges can be ordered by cargo, or found in atmospherics.
  • Reagent dispensers, such as watertanks and beer kegs, can now be filled with any reagent. Fuel tanks are an exception.
  • Most mobile reagent dispensers can leak their contents if you use harm intent wrench on them. Changed how leaking works.
  • Reworked how reagent containers (glass beakers, drinks) behave on interaction. You can splash anyone with any container on harm intent, and drink/use them on other intents.
  • Added a fire storage area in atmospherics that contains firefighting equipment and Monoammonium Phosphate containers.
  • Lube and water can be spread to other tiles if there is too much water or lube on one tile.
  • Adds several new and unique kinetic accelerator parts that can only be found in warehouse or in abandoned crates.
  • Kinetic Accelerators can now be held with two hands for a recoil reduction, accuracy increase, and slight firerate increase. Some high-end kinetic accelerators require two hands to fire, and all kinetic accelerators require two hands to pump.
  • Adds a kinetic analyzer, a device that can be purchased from cargo that analyzes kinetic accelerators, displaying useful data about the assembly.
  • Remapped Xenobiology to be worthy of a research station.
  • Stunbatons have a 95% chance to pacify slimes. 5% chance to make them rabid.

Fire and Glory updated:

  • Vendor K'ois bar packaging has been changed to make it easier for new crew to understand its toxicity

Flamingo updated:

  • Adjusted roof solar wiring to (hopefully) fix the roof solars power routing bug.

Karolis2011 updated:

  • Removes Topic() rate limiting. This should make HTML UIs more responsive.
  • Added completely new Vueui HTML interface system. It should bring more responsive UIs.
  • Added user prefrence for UI theme. At this moment this applies only to Vueui interfaces.
  • Made photocopier and fax machines use Vueui.
  • Made Air control consoles use Vueui.

LordFowl updated:

  • Airlocks will now open when out of power and blast doors will close.
  • Crowbars can no longer open unpowered blast doors.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Adds HUD aviators for each kind of HUD, also adding night/thermal versions to the uplink.
  • Adds civilian sunglasses to the loadout, they do not protect against flashes.

PoZe updated:

  • Hyronalin now causes Diona to receive toxin damage. For reference 10 units will get Diona into cirtical state within 3:30 minutes. 15 unit will kill.
  • Arithrazine now causes Diona to receive deadly toxin damage. Even 5u will kill Diona within 1:03 minutes
  • Tea now causes Diona to receive toxin damage. Tiny bit more then how it cures radiation for other species.
  • Radium now cures toxin damage for Diona. You would need at least 1/3 more of it to cure same amount of Hyronalin effect.
  • Adds cyborg surge prevention upgrade module. It is an upgrade that makes cyborg being immune to 1-3 EMP pulses. Can be constructed by robotics, but is expensive and high tech. After being fried, module can be replaced with new module
  • Adds IPC surge prevention module. Available only via traitor uplink, costs 14 telecrystals. Just like cyborg module it make user immune to 1-3 EMP pulses. Comes in from uplink as modified nanopaste that is one time use(doesn't heal user). Module can be repaired with another traitor nanopaste

TheDocOct updated:

  • Added a conference room to the public surface level, with a bridge-access bolt button.
  • Moved the surface level atmospherics equipment into the surface engineering storage room, and adjusted it accordingly.
  • Renovated the surface command 'Head of Staff Preparation' room into 'Command Dock Monitoring'.

ben10083 updated:

  • Added a Medical Hud to the Medical Module

Ron updated:

  • Corporate Reporters can now access security.
  • Removing a pAI from the potted plant no longer results in two being dropped.

Alberyk updated:

  • You now need to be in the grab intent to climb up walls and climb down open spaces.

  • Fixed inhalers for real now.

PoZe updated:

  • Mechs that were shot with ION guns and got into maintenance mode while having it forbidden to switch the mode can now be unlocked by their DNA owners. By being able to allow maintenance mode.

  • Fixed service cyborg basic sprite eyes overlay

  • Removed the duplicate stamp and fixes the name of the camera in the journalists office.

22 July 2018

Alberyk updated:

  • Removed the thermal drill dispersion, making it a more effective mining tool.
  • Added siik'tau as an alternative language.
  • Bicaridine does not heal lung damage anymore when inhaled.
  • Removed the telebaton stun when aiming for the legs. The telebaton will now deal halloss, pain damage, when attacking in disarm intent
  • Pepperspray does not stun when hitting someone without face protection anymore, it will now cause moderate pain instead.
  • Merchant's pet sellers should sell more mudane animals, and buy more exotic ones, also fixing an exploit with buying and selling animals.
  • Merchant should not be able to buy flags or other objects that can not be moved anymore.
  • Vampires can't bite people wearing airtight helmets due to their necks being protected anymore.
  • Vampires can now drink blood from drinking glasses and etc to gain usable blood.

Arrow768 updated:

  • Adds a Notification System to send notifications to players.
  • A borgs voice is now garbled if its damaged too much.
  • Added a low power warning sound / light that can be activated by borgs if they run out of juice.
  • The taser cooling module can be applied to sec borgs again.
  • Injecting armored targets with the hypospray now takes a while.

BurgerBB updated:

  • Kinetic Accelerators can no longer dig holes. Improved warehouse and abandoned crate loot chances of getting kinetic accelerators. High level kinetic accelerators can now be found.
  • Added a random dungeon framework. Mappers can make their own dungeons and submit them to Github.

Kaedwuff updated:

  • There are no clowns. Move along.

Karolis2011 updated:

  • Made AI's crew holograms more representitive of current state of crew memeber.
  • Made secret mode setup retry automaticly if it fails to setup round.

LordFowl updated:

  • Removes ashy footprints.

LordFowl, BygoneHero, Kyres1 updated:

  • Added the Sedantis flag.
  • Added Vaurca variants of softsuits.
  • Changed Vaurca vision to use client colors.
  • Added climbing. Click on a wall/open turf to climb. Large and/or anchored items increase your ability to climb. Small items decrease your ability to climb.
  • Humans and Vaurca are fastest at climbing, and Unathi and Dionaea are the slowest at climbing.
  • Made Vaurca natural climbers, meaning they can never fail.
  • Added various event-orientated Vaurca items.
  • Vaurca can now wear specially modified softsuits.
  • Added cleave to energy glaives.
  • Changes the sprites of all organs in Vaurca to be more alien.
  • Tweaked client colors, fixing inaccuracies in colorblindedness.
  • Cardox no longer acts as an acid, no longer affecting mobs on touch.

LordFowl, Loow, NursieKitty updated:

  • Removed Skrell allergy to protein.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Added new firearm sounds. Enjoy.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Bucklers can now be made out of wood.

PoZe updated:

  • Airbubble now shows what kind of tank is attached and what is the pressure of the tank when examined
  • Airbubble sprite now shows if airbubble is using tank or not.
  • Fixed names for black and technicolor detective armoured trenchcoats
  • Detective armoured trenchcoats are avaliable in loadout section of character setup. (Only for detectives and HOS)

  • Fixed a slew of cases where an action would or might print a numeric value to the user.
  • Corporate Reports now gain rudimentary department access, so they could better report on corporate affairs.

  • Added camera at Medbay Entrance and renamed the other camera that is now at Emergency Pre-op
  • Gave Clerical Module a denied stamp (WHY WAS THIS THE EMAG ITEM?!) and tape roll, if it's emagged/hacked it gets a chameleon stamp for proper forging of documents.

PoZe updated:

  • Airbubble comes now with fully filled engineering extended airtank(6 liters max). Instead of double emergency airtank(10 liters max). It lasts around the same time, even slightly longer(40 minutes).

  • Airbubbles no longer produces infinite cable restrains.
  • Users of airbubble can no longer 'magically' get out of bubble with it still remaining closed.

18 June 2018

Alberyk updated:

  • Added new tajaran related accessories options to the custom loadout.
  • Added new tajaran related cuisine options.
  • Added a gatling machine gun to the syndicate uplink.
  • Added bayonets.
  • Changed how stuttering is handled in game, it should be less ridiculous overall.

Arrow768 updated:

  • The Tau Ceti Daily Grand Slam Lottery has filed for bankruptcy and has been relaunched under new management.
  • Resourceful employees have found a way to hide things inside of potted plants.

BurgerBB updated:

  • Removed basic kinetic accelerators from code. Replaced them with customizable kinetic accelerators with a robust array of customization. Weaker custom kinetic accelerators can be purchased from the mining vendor or found randomly in cargo, while the stronger variants can be researched and produced by science.
  • Added traitor kinetic accelerators to uplink. These ones shoot laser beams, and can accept custom accelerator parts.
  • Gave wrenches to mining drones and mining cyborgs, so synthetics can tinker with custom KAs.
  • Improved the shuttle and docks design.
  • Users will now be automatically threatened with a day ban if they mention the phrase 'Organ Damage'.
  • Fixed library books spawning outside of shelves.
  • Fixed kinetic accelerators displaying an error when equipped on the waist.
  • Balances kinetic accelerator research to prevent easy research exploit. Balances traitor kinetic accelerator to be less powerful.
  • Tweaked the new library to be more aesthetically pleasing. Removed empty mediwall from the command section of the shuttle. Removed floating light near departures and on the shuttle. Removed pointless holopad on the evac shuttle.

Code - PoZe, Sprites - DronzTheWolf updated:

  • Adds airbubble(oxyball) into the game. It is used to protect user inside from decompressed environment for 30 minutes. Has an air tank attached to it that can be replaced.
  • Adds airbubble to every emergency locker
  • Mercenaries have their own air bubble with special sprites, for kidnapping. Mercenaries have two airbubbles, Heist shuttle has three as they are pirates.

Kaedwuff updated:

  • Librarians now also get a service headset at start.
  • Cyanide no longer makes you instantly pass out, allowing you a precious half minute to say your final goodbyes (or taunts to security) before you die horribly.

LordFowl updated:

  • Sprinting no longer deals oxygen damage unless you have asthma, a coughing disability, or damage to your lungs.
  • Adds the asthma disability to chargen, which reduces your ability to sprint and your ability to naturally regenerate oxygen damage.
  • Adds a new mental disability - Love.

LordRaven001 updated:

  • Ports mixing bowls from Baystation
  • Removed butcher knives from the contraband section in the vendor, added them to the normal vendor.
  • Balanced the Kitchen Vendor around 2 Chefs

MoondancerPony updated:

  • Tweaks a lot of things to do with newscasters. Maybe there will be a fancy new UI soon? Who knows.
  • Removes the Journalist alt-title from Librarian.
  • Adds the Corporate Reporter job and the Freelance Journalist alt-title. Corporate Reporters have more liability and responsibility, but have greater access and legitimacy. Freelance journalists have no such restrictions, but are all on their own. To add to this, there are now two press passes- a normal and a corporate one. These do not guarantee you anything from Security or Command, however, so be warned!
  • The merchandise store has been replaced with a brand-new journalist's office, set up for interviews and writing. Journalists also get their own pet.
  • You can now comment, like, and dislike newscaster stories. PDAs can see, but not interact with, the new newscaster functionality. PDA news features may expand or be removed in the future.

PoZe updated:

  • IPCs can not be convertable to cult.
  • IPCs can no longer draw runes, since they have no blood. They still can use talismans
  • Cultist IPCs are immune to cultist EMP from runes or talismans.
  • Fixed Journalist Office missing power cables.
  • Journalist Office is now connected to the bridge subgrid, instead of main grid.
  • Shuttle wall structures that are on the corners have been moved one tile in different directions, so that it looks good.

Scheveningen updated:

  • Blinding sources are significantly increased in duration.
  • Direct flashes no longer stun those who are -not- sentient trees, robots, or bugpeople.
  • Changed how flash break mechanics work. Crappy budget NT tech is more likely to break from overuse.

ben10083 updated:

  • Following multiple security breaches and thefts from the vault, NanoTrasen has increased security in the main vault.

  • ID Cards ejected from modular computers are no longer ejected onto the floor.

13 May 2018

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed securitrons trying to arrest the head of personnel because of their gun.
  • ERT's id should have the proper access now.
  • Added new tajara related clothing options to the custom loadout.
  • Added partial understanding to some languages, it allows you to understand some words from a certain language without knowing it.
  • Added new tajara language, Delvahhi, available to the Zhan-Khazan.
  • Added new accessory related options to the loadout, such as ties.

Arrow768 updated:

  • It is now possible to call commanded animals by a nickname.
  • The sentencing console has been upgraded with a integrated fining system.
  • Due to protests from the "real" engineers, the janitor is no longer part of the engineering department and has been reintegrated into the service department.
  • NT has entered a cooperation with various news outlets to provide quality information at the start of the shift.
  • Due to quality issues NT has banned Editor Mike Hammers of the Gibson Gazette from publishing news.
  • It has come to our attention that a flaw might effect the containment systems of the station.
  • IPCs can no longer be converted to cultists.

Banditoz updated:

  • You can now use , and . to go up and down z-levels, respectively.

BurgerBB updated:

  • Added additional z-level protection for AI.
  • Moved the bomb range further away from the station to prevent z-level breaches caused by explosions.
  • Butanol based drinks can now be selected from the loadout via flask.
  • Tweaked some of the more boring loot options to be more interesting. Reduced the chance of getting arcade loot in the warehouse. Increased the amount of loot in the warehouse from 80 to 100.
  • Added new food items.
  • Redesigned Hydroponics. Lightly tweaked the layout of cargo.
  • Removed Hextrasenil and Trisyndicotin.
  • Cardox grenades are now located in the vault. Added a bookin various locations reminding non-medical staff not to give mental medication to prisoners.
  • Cardox is now slightly poisonous, and can directly remove phoron from blood when consumed. Cardox can now remove phoron in the air when applied to turfs.
  • Added the panocelium mushrooms, a mushroom mutated from fly amanita. They contain panotoxic, a potent toxin that causes intense amounts of pain. Added Calomel, a special medication that purges most chemicals from the bloodstream. Added Pulmodeiectionem, a special medication that purges most chemicals from the lungs.
  • Added inhalers and autoinhalers. Inhalers and Autoinhalers can quickly add reagents to the lungs. Inhalers can be found in chemistry, made in science, found/ordered from cargo, or purchased from a traitor uplink. Oxygen deprevation kits now contain autoinhalers instead of pills. Added breath analyzers, a medical device that analyzes useful information about the respiratory system. Oxygen deprevation kits now contain breath analyzers instead of health analyzers.
  • Bicardine now heals lung damage when inhaled at the cost of general reduced effectiveness. Phoron, ammonia, hyperzine, dexalin plus, soporific, chloral hydrate, and space drugs are more effective when inhaled. All painkillers, except for inaprovaline, have no effectiveness when breathed in. Tricordrazine has no effectiveness when breathed in. Breathing in acid now deals direct damage to the lungs.
  • Fixed the metabolism rate of mental medication to reflext their intended values. Reduced the dosage threshhold to supress traumas to reflect their intended values.
  • Reworked intoxication entirely. Inebriation lasts generally longer, and the effects are generally more realistic.
  • Added missing seeds to garden vendors. Converted the hydroponics seed vendor into a better vending machine.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Adds shorts, skirts, a leather coat, orange goggles, a colorable headband and leather vests to the loadout.
  • Adds about 10 new cyberpunk themed hairstyles.
  • Shaves half of your head.

PoZe updated:

  • All AI intercom microphones are turned off by default. To help new antag AI players not to accidentally reveal their plans
  • Hostile mobs now attack back any mobs who touch/attack/shoot or throw objects at them. They also now prioritize mobs with lowest health
  • Added oxygen candles as an item. They are one-time emergency item that is used to fill 2-3 tiles of depressurized environment

Skull132 updated:

  • Bumped Vaurca economic modifier by 1 point, as per lore developments.

10 May 2018

Kaedwuff updated:

  • No longer can your victims resist their way out of a good sucking after being hypnotized by your vampire.

08 April 2018

Alberyk updated:

  • Added martial arts, traitors should have access to some of them in their uplinks.
  • Plastic explosives should be more effective in destroying walls.
  • IPC's monitors screen are now considered facial hair, for better interaction with hats.
  • You can now repair emp affected hardsuits with Nanopaste.
  • Added a hardsuit mounted cooling module, printable from robotics.
  • The mounted emag module should work properly now.
  • Replacing a dead ipc's powercell or posibrain should not revive them anymore.
  • Robotics can now create ipcs using a cyborg chassis that had its law system disabled, the new ipc's chassis will be based on the torso's brand. While robotics is unable to print torsos with their own brand, they should be available at cargo.
  • Added new a vaurca fashion option to the custom loadout.

Arrow768 updated:

  • The reason of a cargo order is now sown in the cargo order application in the order details.
  • A manifest is placed inside of each crate ordered from cargo.
  • Orders can now be paid in advance after they have been approved.
  • The shuttle fee is now calculated per order and no longer split over all orders on the shuttle.
  • Changed the backend dataformat of cargo. See Pull #4435 for details.
  • Change the camera networks from Civilian East / Civilian West to Civilian Main / Civilian Surface / Supply / Service

BurgerBB updated:

  • Completely reworked anti-depressants so they only cure certain types of traumas at various strengths. Added additional anti-depressants and special medication. Antidepressants and some painkillers now have adverse effects when with alchohol.
  • Added a new reagant breathing system. Inhaled smoke no longer counts as eating it. Inhaleing reagents is 25% weaker than injecting it directly.
  • Reworked cigarrettes so they actually have effects, including very gradual organ damage and a minor performance enhancer. Custom cigarettes can also be made in the biogenerator, or found elsewhere.
  • Reworked heart damage so that negative effects are more linear. Tweaked oxy loss from blood loss to also be more linear.
  • Improved the mining/cargo layout to better reflect the needs and desires of cargo techs and miners.
  • Ninja matter fabricators now produce steel throwing stars instead of uranium throwing stars. Adjusted the power cost and price of the ninja matter fabricator. Adjusted the weight class of throwing stars to make them smaller. Added steel throwing stars to the traitor uplink.
  • Reduced the amount of reagents in a scrubber blast from 50 to 35.
  • Added paint, luminol, fuel, blood, sterilizine, ipecac, and soporific to scrubber event RNG.
  • Resisting from a chair unrestrained no longer adds a cooldown to activating objects.
  • Action figures are no longer massive, and only take up 1 slot in your inventory.
  • Boxing gloves can now be worn by any race.
  • The ore summoner can only move up to 10 ore at a time.

Kaedwuff updated:

  • IAA now spawn in their office. HoS now also spawn with an improved, imposing distance from their team.

LordFowl updated:

  • Footprints will now be created on ashy turfs, and ash will spread onto the shoes causing ash-tracks.
  • Added electroshock, hypnotic, and isolation therapy. Each cures a specific set of traumas.
  • Brain surgery now only cures certain traumas.
  • Expanded the psychiatry office into a mental health ward.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Adds HUD Eyepatches for Security, Medical, Mesons, Material, and Science.
  • Adds civilian iPatch for general use.
  • Adds Welder Eyepatch.
  • Adds Night Vision and Thermal Vision eyepatches to uplink, and heist roundstart.

PoZe updated:

  • Removed the nurse dress from medical lockers and changes the default nurse outfit to purple scrubs.

Ron updated:

  • Added a sound for firealarms and the shuttle jumping somewhere.

Skull132 updated:

  • Junk food no longer causes heart/organ damage. That PR has been reverted effectively.
  • Junk food now causes nutrition to last less. You'll go hungry roughly twice as fast when eating only junk food.

TheGreatNacho updated:

  • Added gasping for air when people are losing their breath.

soryy708 updated:

  • Created a deeper, espresso centric, coffee mixing system
  • Added 'CoffeeMaster 3000' to the bar
  • Created a 'Barista' alt-title for the bartender

06 April 2018

Printer16 updated:

  • Ninja uplinks and merc uplinks now work properly. Check your tabs for items that were previously unavailable due to the bug.
  • Traitors can no longer see categories they don't have access to.
  • Updated the diseased touch information to show how much it actually uses.
  • You can no longer fold artifact boxes into cardboard.
  • EMP'ing magical staffs no longer breaks them.
  • The RPED now works properly.
  • Mechs can not use crash if they are in maintenance protocols.
  • Updated the e-sword interaction with cigarettes.
  • Xenos can no longer get brain traumuas.
  • Using *halt as a cyborg no longer displays the name twice.
  • Updated the eyedrop failure message.
  • The thermal drill no longer breaks if you move while charging it.
  • Updated implants to work on station zlevels.

  • Set the sentencing machine and brig timer to read the convicts name from their ID, instead of their mob.
  • Fixed lighter being deleted when pulling a cigarette out of it's packet with your mouth.
  • Fixed spears losing their material after mounting head to them.

BurgerBB updated:

  • Made junkfood bread and rasins healthier. Made light junkfood snacks slightly healthier.
  • Lottery cards now generally give less, have 3 scratches per card, and take longer to scratch.

18 March 2018

Alberyk updated:

  • The Automatic Robotic Factory 5000 should now work properly.

Skull132 updated:

  • Magboots and hardsuit gloves now give you your stuff back properly.

13 March 2018

BurgerBB updated:

  • Fixed various chainsaw bugs.
  • Added Chainsaws to traitor uplink.

10 March 2018

Alberyk updated:

  • Added some new gloves; brass knuckles, power fists and clawed gauntlets. Each of them has different effects in unarmed combat when worn.
  • You can now select what kind of unarmed attack you want to use via a verb in the ic tab.
  • Opening or closing a cyborg's cover should take time now.
  • Overclocked cyborgs can't be stunned with a flash anymore.
  • Cyborg's stun batons should drain less power from their cells.
  • Exosuits weapons should be more effective now.
  • Increased exosuit equipment capacity to 4.
  • Added new exosuit weapons.
  • Added more ancient melee weapons.
  • You can strap grenades to spears now.

Arrow768 updated:

  • Due to budget constraints the safeties have been removed from shutters and blast doors. Personnel is advised to stand clear when they are being closed.
  • The deadman switch function from the signaler will now send a signal when the signaler is dropped or moved into a different slot.

BurgerBB updated:

  • Added chainsaws, a powerful two-handed weapon that requires welder fuel to operate. Chainsaws can open airlocks and lockers when powered.
  • Diona nymphs can perform partial merges at half biomass, with the consequence of missing limbs. The more biomass, the less missing limbs.
  • Added a mask and eyewear slot for dionaea.
  • Made Dionaea immune to the effects of blindfolds and muzzles.
  • Dionaea receive only 25% arousal per second from blindfolds and muzzles.
  • Added several new preservatives and flavorings in vending machine junkfood. As a result, junkfood is now more filling.
  • Tweaked pain messages.
  • Penalties for Organ damage now start at >=1 instead of >0.
  • Added Adipemcina, a fictional heart medication that specially reduces heart damage.
  • Added filtered kois, a significantly less dangerous kois which can be made by combining Cardox and normal kois. Added Cardox, an anti-phoron reagent which can eliminate phoron and remove the harmful spores from kois.
  • Replaced kois bars with less dangerous kois bars containing filtered kois which do not spore. Dangerous ones are moved to the contraband section, which can be hacked and vended for free. Phoron punch also now has filtered kois, but no alternative.
  • Decreased the Kois spore chance when eating unfiltered Kois.
  • Rebalanced lottery tickets so you don't win as much. Lottery tickets can now be purchased at cigarette machines as well.

Buterrobber202 updated:

  • The Wizard Federation is pleased to announce that they have started to actually train Wizards outside of the Spatial School, meaning they should have more useable spells during their missions.

Ezuo updated:

  • You can now make Ned Kelly style armor by using an ordinary trenchcoat on makeshift armor. Be protected and stylish at the same time!
  • You now must detach helmets from suits to refit them.
  • Skrellian spacesuits are now voidsuits, allowing you to attach helmets and magboots to them.

Juani2400 updated:

  • Complete remap of the Medical main level. Expect bugs and missing equipment.
  • New nuke chamber, added an alternative exit for the bunker, new location for CSI's and Detective's offices, new Security Training Wing, remapped Kitchen, new shop, remapped Vault's entrance.
  • New transfer/escape shuttle. Not the final version, probably. Consider it an experiment to test your acceptance to the new design type.
  • New Research-coloured folders (Sprite recolouring by Fire and Glory).
  • A lot of bugfixes, missing stuff, and minor suggestions requested by you in this: https://forums.aurorastation.org/viewtopic.php?f=18&t=9863. You should visit and leave your suggestions there.

Kaedwuff updated:

  • The AI's Common Channel intercom will no longer betray Traitor or Malf AIs. Unless they want it to.
  • Straightjackets can now be escaped from, if you have sufficient time alone, and new sprites have been given to make them more jackety.
  • Druid and Cleric wizards can now take their victims for granite.
  • Added a number of new cocktails made with unathi booze. Many have custom sprites, and one of them is slightly dangerous to non-unathi.

Lohikar updated:

  • ZAS Knockdown now has a distance cap. (Fixes 'space wind')

LordFowl updated:

  • Batons will now deal both brute and shock damage.
  • Electricity system modified to be more realistic in its arcing and damage,
  • Electricity can now cause electronic damage.
  • IPCs will now be paralysed by cattleprods, stunrods, and harmbatons targeted at the chest.

PoZe, AndurilFlame updated:

  • Trench coat, detective's coat, coloured detective's coats, and gentlecoat are now able to be buttoned up and unbottoned.

Skull132 updated:

  • Added the flag of the best nation: the Eridani Corporate Federation.

kevinz000 updated:

  • Projectiles have received a major overhaul into pixel projectiles processed by subsystem a la TG.

24 February 2018

BurgerBB updated:

  • Improved tortilla and burrito recipies. Dips are also more flavorful.

sdtwbaj updated:

  • Skrell have a higher chance to get more money.

11 February 2018

Lohikar updated:

  • The asteroid's sprites should no longer get fucked up by shuttle movement, explosions, or mining.
  • Breaking asteroid floors on the lowest level will now break to openspace/space instead of more asteroid.

04 February 2018

Alberyk updated:

  • Sharp weapons and welders are twice as effective in destroying plants.
  • Removed k'ois seeds from the botany's seed storage.

LordFowl updated:

  • The number of spores released by a plant is now dependent on the plants potency.
  • K'ois health has been reduced by half.

31 January 2018

LordFowl updated:

  • Both versions of K'ois mycosis will mature at a doubled rate.
  • Added SSD timers for when examining inactive/disconnected mobs.

29 January 2018

Alberyk updated:

  • Cutting someone's hand should now force them to drop the item they are holding on said hand.

28 January 2018

BurgerBB updated:

  • Poking people with a cane no longer causes blood to fly everywhere.
  • Tweaked Arcade Machine droprates so they're less depressing.
  • Tweaked burito recipies to use more meatballs, and as well use a new nutrition algorithm.
  • Tweaked dionaea autohiss to be less annoying.

27 January 2018

AgentWhatever updated:

  • Constructing a console or computer now makes sense visually

Alberyk updated:

  • Emagged cyborgs should now be immune to detonation by robotics console.
  • Examining a cyborg will now reveal what modules they are holding and each module is active.
  • Antag related species, such as vox, xenomorphs and skeletons, can now pry open airlocks by clicking on them with harm intent.
  • Return alien weeds to their old format, replacing the vines.
  • Alien acid should now be able to melt floors.
  • Added makeshift material based armor, you should be able to craft it using some materials and a bucket.
  • Some weapons, such as axes, are able to cleave and hit targets around their original victim now.
  • Re-added facehuggers to xenomorphs, bringing back all the infection circle.
  • Ported crawling mechanics from polaris: you can now crawl, if lying down, by dragging your sprite to a title near yourself.
  • Vampire's dominate should now require more total blood to unlock.
  • Increased dominate's blood cost to 50.
  • Added railgun's magazines and radioisotope thermoelectric generator designs to research and development.
  • Trying to move, when possible, will now resist if you are grabbed.
  • Throwing a grab will now always break the grab, do not matter the distance.
  • Holy water should be more effective when fighting the undead.
  • Added explosive land mines, you can get them by using an uplink.
  • Added more options to the loadout, such as colorable sweaters, flower pins and towels.
  • Added more underwear options.
  • Increased the total loadout points to ten.
  • Added a new type of wound; punctures, caused by stabbing attacks and pointed weapons.
  • Phoron gas should be purple now, to match the solid and liquid form.
  • Added rings, ported from baystation12, to the custom loadout.
  • You should now be able to interact with airlock's buttons and controllers while inside a mecha.
  • Removed the binary channels from posibrains.
  • Added a plasma cutter as an emmaged module to the contruction module.
  • Unathi handcuff breaking should now cost stamina.
  • You can now properly click on people and objects that are on water titles, such as the pool.
  • Changed how the telebaton's stun works, it should now take in consideration things like spacesuits, armor and species related variables when stunning a target.

Arrow768 updated:

  • Buffs the Malf AI. Hacking APCs provides more CPU and RAM.
  • Ties the Nuke into the AI station-selfdestruct. Inserting the disk aborts it.
  • Changed the thermaldrill to be more useful for mining and less useful for killing people.
  • Cargo now has a delivery application to allow recipients to pay for the order and confirm the delivery
  • The order application no longer returns to the main menu after adding a item to the order.
  • Tweaks the access of all heads of staff. They now have all access to their department and basic access to the others.

BRAINOS updated:

  • Added 19 new hairstyles and 3 new beards.

BurgerBB updated:

  • Added syndicate balloons, nanotrasen balloons, replica katanas, bosun whistles, champion belts, invisible pens, bikehorns, lipstick, fake moustashes, clown masks, mime masks, fake wands, binoculars, megaphones, random booze, and the banhammer to the arcade loot tables.
  • Toy mechs are significatnly rarer.
  • Toy swords now spawn with random colors (red,blue,purple,green) as opposed to just the static blue.
  • Removed duplicate katana code that seemingly exists for no real reason.
  • Added additional biogenerator recipies as well as the ability to emag the biogenerator. Emagged Biogenerators unlocked hidden recipies.
  • Biogenerated Meat is replaced with Biomeat; a differently colored variant of regular meat with additional flavoring, but still has the functionality of meat. Added Vitamin Pills that contain 25 nutrients and 1 random flavoring of juice.
  • Reworked biogenerator code so that recipies are easier to add internally. Changed and added some sound paths, and slightly improved the UI by adding the ability to make multiple items of the same type in the Biogenerator for all recipies.
  • When creating milk, cartons of milk are spawned instead of being put into the biogenerator's internal bottle.
  • Removed hidden super secret monkey recipie from the Biogenerator.
  • Sorted locker equipment so it's much more effiecient in terms of loadout.
  • Added new cane abilities based on intent. Help intent pokes people; disarm intent smacks people for slight damage, with a chance to disarm; Grab intent grabs people, harm intent deals regular damage.

Chaoko99 updated:

  • Added a preference to check if the player is on harm intent before firing; defaults off.
  • Added SUPER MAIM: A unified system for dice-roll gibbing per limb, rather than a flat chance without respect to body part.
  • Fixed the plasma cutter's inability to dismember.
  • Changed the following weapons and their ammo to use SUPER MAIM: Desert Eagle (.50), Anti-Material Sniper Rifle (a145), Mateba (.357), Plasma Cutter. Buckshot.

Ezuo updated:

  • Ported Chinsky's implementation of using the numpad to select damage zones. 1-6 for limbs, body and groin. The limb keys toggle between arm/leg and hand/foot. The 8 key toggles between head/mouth/eyes. Use control+numpad if you dont use hotkeys.

Lohikar updated:

  • You can now elect to have a grey (default) colored bag instead of your job specific type.
  • Objects partially obscured by shadow will no longer be partially fullbright.
  • Zeng-Hu has released the new Zeng-Hu Mobility Frame, a positronic chassis that emphasizes speed at the cost of fragility.
  • Bishop Cybernetics have released their Accessory Frame, a positronic chassis designed to catch the eye while remaining power-efficient.
  • Hephaestus Industries has announced their Generation 2 Industrial Frame, designed to withstand more abuse than its competitors at the cost of agility.
  • Xion Manufacturing Group has announced their version of the HI G1 Industrial Frame, engineered to be an affordable and cool-running industrial worker.
  • IPCs are now flashable.
  • Computers now occasionally beep.
  • Your HUD no longer lies to you about your health if you're actually dead.
  • Spreading-style explosions have been rewritten: they should be faster and more reliable.
  • Spreading-style explosions now have simple explosions' directional explosion sounds.
  • Spreading-style explosions now cross Z-levels.
  • Light tubes will now make a plonk noise when turning on.
  • Light switches now make a noise when switched.
  • Lights in an area will now turn on/off in a random order when they lose/gain power.
  • Lights without power will now enter 'emergency mode': they'll glow a dim red and draw from a small internal cell, which lasts approximately 10 minutes. Emergency mode can be disabled at the APC, and the cell can be replaced.
  • Light switches will now glow in the dark.
  • The asteroid once again has random rock decals on flooring.
  • Non-surface Z levels will now use a rockier asteroid floor sprite.
  • Fixed some grammar issues with rock/sand names & tweaked their descriptions slightly. Sand has been renamed to ash to better match the sprite.
  • Dinnerware vendors now stock lunchboxes.

LordFowl updated:

  • NanoTrasen has discontinued their subversive elements report and has replace it with a priority report on various other crew metrics.
  • Implements Black K'ois.
  • Implements Black K'ois Mycosis and K'ois Mycosis.
  • Buffs K'ois healing properties
  • Vaurca can now control which limb they bite
  • Fixes a bug where Vaurca lungs would start processing twice.
  • Modifies Industrial eyes. Industrial eye's are also now more receptive to coloring, so you can have any color you like.
  • Added vending machine restockers, which can be used to restock vending machines. Can be ordered from cargo with a custodial ID.
  • Added the janicart deluxe, a multi-object vehicle that can be used to clean wide swathes of area with its turbomop and space hoover attachments.
  • Added backmounted chemsprayers.
  • Janitors have been moved from civilian to engineering.
  • Flags and banners are now available in the custom loadout sections. Banners are one tile decals, flags are 2x1 tile decals.
  • Diona nymphs produced from a gestalt's death will now follow the player diona nymph.
  • The player can freely control any of their constituent nymphs after they split at will by middle-clicking on them, and will switch to any living nymph should their active nymph die.
  • Diona gestalts can now devour mobs as well as their constituent nymphs can.
  • Diona will once again regrow severed limbs.
  • Diona and nymphs will once again gain biomass from eating food.
  • Devouring will now actually devour the target.
  • Removes energy weapons (except the Lawgiver MkII) from the RnD protolathe.
  • Adds components for the construction of modular energy weapons to the RnD protolathe. An energy weapon can be constructed by adding a capacitor, a lens, and a modulator plus any number of modifiers to an appropriate chassis.
  • Added more spam.
  • SSD/Inactivity timers are available when examining another player.
  • Brain damage no longer causes effects directly. It will now introduce trauma traits based on a threshold-percentage progression. Brain damage still causes brain-death at 60.
  • Adds trauma traits: Come in three flavors: mild, severe, and special. Mild range from annoying to dangerous. Severe range from dangerous to annoyingly dangerous. Special are oddly beneficial, sometimes
  • Normally a mob can only have one mild trauma and one severe/special trauma at a time.
  • Citalopram and Paroxetine can be used to suppress traumas, while brain surgery can be used to remove them. Maybe the psychiatrist will see some use? Not.
  • Oxygen loss will now cause brain damage if it is severe enough.
  • Intoxication will now induce brain damage at a severe enough level.
  • Many brain damaging effects have been given a cap, making them non-lethal.
  • Added a new plant gene, TRAIT_SPOROUS, which if set the plant will periodically release smoke clouds of its constituent reagents.
  • Added a new Vaurca-centric drink to cola vendors, appropriately named Phoron Punch.
  • Added a K'ois paste to the bartender's soft-drink dispenser. Possibilities of bartender mixes involving kois paste in the future.
  • Vaurca now spawn with more phoron in their starting tank, K'ois now provides more phoron when consumed, and K'ois bars are now cheaper, so that the need to breathe phoron is less of a round-determining chore.

MattAtlas updated:

  • The Mateba now uses .454 caliber and has a different firing sound.
  • Changed the Heist readied-player requirement down from 15 to 12. Also modified minimum raiders down from 4 to 3.

Pacmandevil updated:

  • Firing pins. Guns now need an Authentication device to fire. there are several different types.
  • Science now has a testing range to test guns in.

Printer16 updated:

  • Ported the ambition system for antags.
  • Running or walking over blood can cause you to slip.
  • You are now able to view where an object is stuck inside someone when you examine them.
  • Mesons now glow green when activated.
  • Using a soda can with harm intent now shakes it up causing it to explode on whoever opens it.
  • You can now toggle the announcement voice. The option is in the ASFX menu.

Scheveningen updated:

  • Changes Baseline + Industrial burn modifiers. Baselines are more susceptible to burn, Industrials handle heat better and survive for longer.
  • Also changes default damage modifiers for synthetic limbs. Retains its brute resistance, but takes more damage from burn-based sources.

Skull132 updated:

  • Code phrases and responses are properly generated again.
  • Mercs, heisters, and revs now get code phrases and responses, as they're all somewhat involved with the Syndicate. This is with mixed modes in mind.
  • Added a roof indicator to the top right of the game screen.
  • Added move-up and -down buttons to the AI UI. Sprites courtesy of BygoneHero.

Synnono updated:

  • NanoTrasen is proud to announce that the bar now features 21 new beverages. Please drink responsibly.
  • Edited the recipe for the Old Fashioned. It is now the old fashioned way to make an Old Fashioned.
  • Brown Star (Star-Kist) can now be found in soft drink dispensers. Lemon Juice is now available from the Booze-o-Mat like other citrus juices.
  • Added a sprite for the Metropolitan. Finally.
  • Edited some existing beverage descriptions and tastes.

WrongEnd updated:

  • Adds anal retentive bolt action rifles and prank guns.

14 January 2018

Lohikar updated:

  • Unathi can no longer chew through metal.

LordFowl updated:

  • You can no longer climb down ladders if a solid turf is in the way.
  • Only mobs will be prevented from falling down an open turf by ladders. Non mobs will fall, ladder or not.

30 December 2017

PoZe updated:

  • Turret control panels who has turrets with one fire mode only no longer can switch modes.
  • Mix of turrets with different fire modes now will work as it should be. Using turrets with same fire mode as desired.
  • Built turrets now have same fire rate as the gun it was made of

22 December 2017

Alberyk updated:

  • The tranquilizer rifle should work properly now.
  • Fixed some items, such as animals, not appearing when opening a christmas gift.

LordFowl updated:

  • Mining drones no longer have all access IDs.
  • Mining drones can be upgraded with kinetic accelerators, further cementing the obsolescence of the human shaft miner.
  • Mining drones can no longer be upgraded with plasma cutters, and their emag module is no longer a thermal drill.

12 December 2017

Lohikar updated:

  • Engineering crews have corrected a fault in station wiring that caused station lighting to be instead connected to the Equipment power pool. Officials suspect a prank from misbehaving maintenance drones.

PoZe updated:

  • Fixed AI seeing mobs who use stealth suits. That is both ninja and raider's stealth suit or anyone else with same technology.
  • BST sunglasses now protect from welder damage
  • GODMODE now also protects user from welder damage

Skull132 updated:

  • CCIAA can now see the round type.

08 December 2017

Lohikar updated:

  • Made some changes to how the server deletes pipes; explosions will probably be laggier, but there should no longer be crushing lag 5 minutes later.

Santa updated:

  • Merry Christmas NSS Aurora!

  • Stacking units no longer illegally produce unlicenced cyborg glass synthesizers.

  • Removed diona nymph mind control. (Players will no longer aggressively grab themselves when trying to grab a diona nymph.)

  • Tesla's Engine APC is no longer affected by power down even
  • Tesla coils and grounding rods can now be fully constructed from machine assembly

Lohikar updated:
